loans.use: to buy a laptop for his university studies

loans.name: Ahmadjon

texts.ru: Ахмадчону 20 лет. Он очень умный и трудолюбивый молодой человек. Ахмадчон является студентом 3 курса  Аграрного Университета Таджикистана. Он учится в очное отделение. Ахмадчон учится отлично и активно участвует во всех мероприятиях университета. Он изучает агарный сектор и планирует после окончания университета развевать аграрный сектор страны. Родители простые рабочие и их доход не позволяет им оплатить за учебу сына. Ахмадчон запрашивает займ для оплаты учебы в университете. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Ahmadjon is 20 years old. He is a very smart and hardworking young person. Ahmadjon is a third-year student of the Tajikistan Agrarian University. He studies full-time. Ahmadjon studies excellently and actively participates in all of the university events. He is learning the agrarian sector and planning to help develop the country's agrarian sector after his graduation from the university. His parents are simple workers, whose income does not allow to pay for their son's education. Ahmadjon is requesting this loan to pay for his university tuition. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for his university tuition

loans.name: Shohakim

texts.en:
Shohakim is a very clever and smart young man. He graduated from school successfully four years ago and has applied to the National University of Tajikistan. 

Shohakim studies at the faculty of finance and credit. He is one of the best students of his university and likes all subjects that he studies there. His hobby is playing football. His parents are workers, and their income is too small to pay for Shohakim’s study at the university. 

Shohakim wants to be one of the best financiers in his town. He is purposeful and hardworking. He is asking for a loan to pay for his study at the university. He awaits your support.

loans.use: to pay for tuition.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy an appliance in order to provide greater comfort for her family.

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty is 24 years old, married and together with her spouse, they have been blessed with one child. She is involved in poultry farming and sells maize and beans. She has been in this business for 3 years.
She plans to use this loan to buy more stock of maize and beans to sell. She will use the anticipated profits to pay school fees for her child.
This is her first loan from VisionFund Kenya and her future hopes are to have a successful business and succeed in life.

loans.use: to buy maize and beans to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a television for his home.

loans.name: Asbel

texts.en:
Asbel sells milk and has been running the business for the past two years. He is 28 years old, married, and together with his spouse has been blessed with two children. Currently he makes a monthly income of KES 17,500.

He plans to use this loan to buy more stock of milk to sell. He will use the anticipated profits to educate his children, provide adequate food for his family, and buy land and build a house for his family. 

This is his first loan term from VisionFund Kenya. In the future, he hopes to have a successful business, make more income, and improve his family's living standards.

loans.use: to buy more stock of milk to sell.

loans.name: Mary-Ann

texts.en:
Mary-Ann works hard to support her family. She is married and has an electronic mobile load retailing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for three years now.

Mary-Ann requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to purchase an additional amount of electronic mobile load to sell to her customers.

In the future, Mary-Ann would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase an additional amount of electronic mobile load to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Miraflor

texts.en:
Miraflor is 33 years old, married, and has two children who attend school. She raises livestock in the Philippines, which she has been doing for three years.

Miraflor requested her seventh loan from NWTF for 10,000 PHP, which she will use to buy vitamins, vaccines, and other supplies for her livestock. In the future, she would like to expand her business and save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase vitamins, vaccines, and other supplies for her livestock

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es:
Gerardo es un campesino de 52 años de edad, trabajador y humilde, que desde niño aprendió a realizar todas las labores del campo, gracias a las enseñanzas de sus padres. 

Esto le ha permitido progresar y, hoy en día posee cultivos de zanahoria, plátano y maracuyá, cultivos que asiste todos los días y las cosechas son vendidas en la plaza de mercado del municipio de Santa Fe De Antioquia, adicionalmente, realiza labores de jornalero en diferentes fincas de la región, pues con ello complementa los ingresos con los que vela por el bienestar de su familia para sacarla adelante. 

Con el apoyo del crédito comprará insumos agrícolas al por mayor (abonos, pesticidas, fertilizantes y otros), con esto seguirá cuidando sus cultivos y tendrá una mejor cosecha, mucho más productiva, con lo que mejorará los ingresos a la hora de vender sus productos. 

Gerardo, con su espíritu emprendedor, su pujanza y tenacidad, quiere seguir luchando para cumplir el sueño de tener una finca propia, en la que pueda cultivar mucha más variedad de productos y así mejorar la rentabilidad del negocio, garantizando una estabilidad económica para dar mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Gerardo is a 52 year old farmer who is hardworking and humble.  As a child he learned how to perform all types of farming tasks, thanks to the teachings of his parents. This has allowed him to make progress and today he has crops of carrots, bananas and passion fruit.  He attends to the crops every day and then sells then in the center plaza of the municipal market of Santa Fe De Antioquia.  Also, he works as a laborer in different farms of the region. With this work he supplements his income to take care of the well-being of his family and help them get by.  

With the help of the loan he will buy agricultural supplies in bulk (compost, pesticides, fertilizers and others). With this he will continue to care for his crops and will obtain a better, more productive harvest.  This will allow him to make better profits in the moment of selling his produce. Gerardo, with his entrepreneurial spirit and tenacity, wants to keep fighting to achieve his goals and have his own farm.  That way he can harvest a bigger variety of produce and ensure better profitability for his business, guarantying economic stability to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies in bulk (compost, pesticides, fertilizers and others)

loans.name: Rosie

texts.en:
Rosie earns her living by operating a direct sales business. She offers personal collections of household goods for sale directly to her customers. She has been in this business for 20 years now and works hard to support her family. 

Rosie requested a loan in the amount of PhP 10,000 loan through NWTF. She will use her loan funds to purchase a new personal collection of products to offer for sale to her customers.

Her aspiration is to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a new personal collection of products to offer for sale to her customers

loans.name: Carlos Enrique

texts.es:
El señor Carlos tiene gran experiencia en el área de la preparación y venta de distintos tipos de alimentos, los prepara en compañía de su esposa en su casa y luego los distribuye a través del municipio de Chigorodo en su motocicleta. 

Hasta ahora este negocio le ha generado muy buenos resultados.
Siempre ha preferido trabajar independiente, trabaja todos los días desde las 8:00 Am hasta las 9:00 Pm

Actualmente necesita un auxilio para comprar insumos para la preparación de sus alimentos y para realizar el mantenimiento de su motocicleta.

El préstamo le permitirá trabajar en unas mejores condiciones y podrá garantizar la calidad de sus preparaciones.

Su mayor sueño es poder tener un  gran restaurante que atienda mucha gente.

Con esta ayuda podrá trabajar de una manera más organizada y con mejor seguridad.
texts.en:
Carlos has a great deal of experience in the field of preparing and selling various types of foods. He prepares them along with his wife at home and then distributes them throughout the city of Chigorodo on his motorcycle. To date, this business has generated good profits for him. He has always preferred to work independently; he works every day from 8:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m.

Currently, he needs some assistance to buy supplies to prepare his foods and perform maintenance on his motorcycle. The loan will allow him to work in better conditions and guarantee the quality of his preparations. 

His greatest dream is to be able to have a large restaurant that serves a lot of people.

With this help, he will be able to work in a more organized fashion and more safely.

loans.use: To buy supplies to prepare his foods and perform maintenance on his motorcycle.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is 56 years old, married, and has five children. She operates a pig fattening business in the Philippines, which she has been doing for 10 years. She earns additional income from a general store. 

Lucia requested a loan from NWTF for 10,000 PHP, which she will use to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs. In the future, she hopes to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Amadu

texts.en: Amadu is a maize farmer from the Tunkuna village. Before he became a Babban Gona member, Amadu would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater to his immediate cash needs. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Amadu can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. When asked, Amadu said: “I will now be able use this extra income to expand my farmland, and eventually, I hope to make more money for myself and my family.”

loans.use: to access a loan to meet urgent expenses like child school fees, and food and farm loan repayments.

loans.name: Nasiru

texts.en:
Nasiru is a maize farmer from Kankanki village. Before he became a Babban Gona member, Nasiru would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater for his immediate cash needs. 

With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Nasiru can now store his maize after harvest time and then sell it a few months later at up to 40% higher rates than the market price at harvest. 

When asked, Nasiru said: “I would now be able use this extra income to expand my farmland, and eventually, I hope to become the most profitable farmer in my community.”

loans.use: to eliminate pressure to sell corn at low prices, increasing incomes by up to 40%.

loans.name: Abdullahi

texts.en: Abdullahi is a maize farmer from the Marmara village. Before he became a Babban Gona member, Abdullahi would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater to his immediate cash needs. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Abdullahi can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. When asked, Abdullahi said: “I will now be able use this extra income to expand my farmland, and eventually, I hope to become the most profitable farmer in my community.”

loans.use: to access a loan to meet urgent expenses like child school fees and food and farm loan repayments.

loans.name: Tony Enrique

texts.es:
Tony es un veterano con mucha experiencia en el campo. 

Es humilde y sencillo, tiene un gran don de gente y energía suficiente para poder cualquier cultivo a producir.

El tiene un cultivo de plátano y yuca el cual trabaja todos los días para vender sus cosechas en la plaza de mercado del municipio de Montería.

Gracias a sus años de experiencia y enseñanzas que le dio su padre desde niño, tiene plena capacidad para trabajar y para asesorar en estos temas a los demás agricultores de la zona que necesiten ayuda con su producción.

El solicita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes, semillas de plátano y pesticidas, de esta manera inyectara capital a su actividad y mejorara sus cosechas de una manera significativa.

Tiene mucha fe en su negocio y grandes esperanzas en las personas solidarias que apoyan a los campesinos trabajadores.

Apoya a un humilde agricultor para que pueda sacar adelante sus tierras!
texts.en:
Tony is a man with a great experience from working in the countryside. He is a simple and humble man who has great social skills and the energy required to grow any kind of crop.

Tony grows plantains and cassava. He works every day and sells his produce at the local marketplace, in Montería.

Thanks to his vast experience and everything his father taught him when he was a kid, he can work and help other farmers that need help with their plantations.

Tony is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, plantain seeds and pesticides. This will give him some capital to work with and will result in significant improvements for his harvest.

He is confident of his business and hopes to receive support from good-hearted people that want to help hardworking farmers.

Help a humble farmer to get ahead by working his land!

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, plantain seeds and pesticides.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy different kinds of home appliances to resell to her customers.

loans.name: Amah

texts.fr: Demeurant à Lomé précisément au quartier Baguida, Amah est âgée de 32 ans, mariée et mère de quatre (04) enfants, elle fait le commerce des produits céréaliers, d’ignames, de l’huile et de la farine de blé depuis 1997, qu’elle achète à l’intérieur du pays et s’approvisionne six (06) fois par mois. Amah habite dans une maison en location dont le toit est en tôle, leur latrine est traditionnelle, a un niveau primaire et se nourrit deux fois par jours ;ayant mesuré la lourdeur de la responsabilité qui lui fait face, Amah désire vivement un microcrédit pour augmenter la potentialité de son activité de revenu afin de participer à la charge du foyer et alléger les dépenses qui pèsent sur le dos de son mari, et aussi avoir beaucoup plus de bénéfices.
texts.en: Amah lives in Lome, more exactly in Baguida. She is 32 years old and has four children. She has been selling cereals, yams, oil and wheat flour since 1997. She buys the products further inland and stocks up six times a month. Amah lives in a rented house that has a sheet metal roof, their latrine is traditional of a basic standard and she eats twice a day. Having thought hard about the great responsibility that is hers, Amah fervently desires a micro-credit to enhance the potential of her money making activity in order to participate in covering the household expenses which rest on her husband's shoulders, and also to have more profits.

loans.use: to buy one sack of corn, 15 bowls of manioc flour, and 30 yams.

loans.name: Nasibakhon

texts.ru: Насибахон студентка 3 курса Национального Университета Таджикистана. Она учится отлично и активно участвует во всех мероприятиях университета. Насибахон учится в факультете фармацевтики. Она живет вместе с матерью. Ее мать работает в государственном учреждении, и ее зарплата не хватает для оплаты учебного договора Насибахона за 3 курс. Насибахон запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Nasibakhon is a third-year student at the Tajikistan National University. She is an excellent student and actively participates in university activities. She studies in the pharmacy department and lives with her mother, who works in public service. Her salary is not enough to pay for Nasibakhon's third-year tuition, so Nasibakhon is requesting a loan. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your compassion.

loans.use: To pay for her tuition

loans.name: Gulnor

texts.ru: Гулнор планирует организовать новый бизнес. Она много лет не имела источника дохода. Теперь она хочет начать бизнес изготовлением и продажей пирожки, так как она готовит вкусные пирожки. Она долго искала помощь и наконец, она узнала о курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованной Ассоциация Деловых Женщин. Она участвовала на этом курсе и получила много позитива для себя. После завершения курса она получила сертификат. Теперь она готова начать бизнес, однако она не имеет денег, чтобы купить муку, масло. Она будет готовить пирожки дома и продавать на местном рынке. В дальнейшем она планирует открыть кафе. С полученного дохода она планирует улучшить условию проживания для своих 2 детей. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1500 сомони для покупки муку и масло.  Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Gulnor is planning to start a new business. She has not had a source of income for many years. Now she wants to start a business preparing and selling pastries because she can make delicious ones. She had been looking for help for a long time when she finally learned about the "Achieve Success" course offered by the Association of Businesswomen. She participated in the course and got a lot out of it. She received a certificate after completing the course. Now she is ready to start the business, but she does not have money to buy flour and butter. She will cook the pastries at home and sell them at the local market. In the future, she plans to open a cafe. She will used her profits to improve the living conditions for her two children. She is requesting a loan of 1,500 somoni to buy flour and butter. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy flour and butter and start a new business

loans.name: Eliud

texts.en:
Eliud is 39 years old, married, and has three children. He buys green tea leaves and sells them to various tea processing companies, which he has been doing for five years. 

Eliud requested his first loan from VisionFund Kenya, which he will use to buy more stock of green tea leaves to sell. He will use the anticipated profits to expand his business by buying more stock of green tea leaves. In the future, he hopes to expand his business and be successful in life.

loans.use: to purchase green tea leaves to sell.

loans.name: Vita

texts.en:
Vita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a personal collection products business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy more products like detergent, body spray, body soap, lotion, etc. to sell at her business.

Vita has been in this business for six years. Vita also earns extra income from farming vegetables.

She has successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Vita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more products like detergent, body spray, body soap, lotion, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Natividad

texts.en:
Natividad works hard to support her family. Natividad is married and has a tobacco vending business in the Philippines.
Natividad requested a PHP 23,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock of tobacco to sell to her customers.
Natividad has been in this business 10 years now.
She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to continue to build her business.
Natividad would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock of tobacco to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Roza

texts.ru: Роза успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она очень благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Розы есть 5 коров, 24 овцы и 1 лошадь. На своем земельном участке она по-прежнему выращивает картофель, зерновые культуры и люцерну, получая ежемесячный доход 10,000 сом (KGS). Роза обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для откорма и перепродажи. Доходы от кредита Роза будет вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Roza has successfully repaid her previous loan as directed. She is very grateful to the Kiva Fund and everyone, who had helped her with the financing. Today, Roza's business contains 5 cows, 24 sheep and 1 horse. She continues to grow potatoes, cereal crops and alfalfa on her land plot, and receives a monthly income of 10,000 som (KGS). Roza requested a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy livestock for fattening up and resale. Roza will invest the earnings from the loan into further developing her business.

loans.use: to buy livestock for fattening up and resale

loans.name: Anargul

texts.ru: Анаргул 40 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Анаргул - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством, благодаря упорному труду Анаргул, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 3 коровы, а также земельный надел мерою 1,0 ГА, где она выращивает кукурузу для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации местным жителям. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 15,000 сом (KGS). Супруг и дети активно помогают по хозяйству. Накопленные средства стараются вкладывать в развитие и расширение бизнеса. Однако в этом году так как закончили строительство дома, появилась необходимость сделать его отделку, поэтому Анаргул обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сомов (KGS) на покупку дверей, цемента, реек и прочих строительных материалов. Таким образом, она сделает дома ремонт, подготовит его к зиме, сохранив при этом скот.
texts.en: Anargul is 40 years old, married and raising 4 children together with her husband. Anargul has a secondary education and, to provide the primary income for her family, is involved in animal husbandry and farming. Thanks to Anargul's hard work, today her business contains 3 cows and a 1.0 hectare land plot, where she grows corn for the household consumption and sale to local residents. The monthly income amounts to about 15,000 som (KGS). Her husband and children actively help with the business. They try to invest their savings into the development and expansion of the business. However, because they just finished their house construction this year, they have a need to work on its exterior trim, and this is why Anargul requested a loan in the amount of 130,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy doors, cement, planks and other building materials. This way she will repair her house, prepare it for the winter and retain her livestock quantities.

loans.use: to buy doors, cement, planks and other building materials to repair her house

loans.name: Bas Nere De Yaoghin Group

texts.fr:
Mr OUSMANE représente le groupe  BAS NERE DE YAOGHIN. Marié, il est père de 01enfant. Il est âgé de 12mois.
Mr collecte et vend les objets recyclable depuis 09ans. Il s’approvisionne dans son secteur. 
Mr veut s’acheter 20batteries usés, 60chaises usés, du fer etc.
Avec  ses bénéfices, il veut renforcer son activité. Mr ambitionne toujours ouvrir un grand magasin d’objets usés.
texts.en:
Mr. Ousmane represents the Bas Nere De Yaoghin group. He is married with one child aged 12 months.
Mr. Ousmane has been collecting and selling recyclable goods for nine years. He gets his stock in his neighbourhood.
He wants to buy 20 used batteries, 60 used chairs, some iron etc.
With the profits he wants to expand his business. Mr. Ousmane's ambition is to open a big shop selling used objects.

loans.use: to buy 20 used batteries, 60 used chairs, some iron etc.

loans.name: Audu

texts.en: Audu is a maize farmer from the Chiroma village. Before he became a Babban Gona member, Audu would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater to his immediate cash needs. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Audu can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. When asked, Audu said: “I will now be able use this extra income to expand my farmland, and eventually, I hope to become the most profitable farmer in my community.”

loans.use: To access a loan to meet urgent expenses like child school fees, and food and farm loan repayments.

loans.name: Ana María

texts.es:
Ana de 52 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar debido a que donde ella vivía no habían escuelas producto a que tuvieron que salir toda su familia del país por la guerra que se vivía en el país y también porque sus padres no tenían el suficiente dinero para ponerla a estudiar y como eran varios hermanos se les hacía difícil mandarlos a la escuela a estudiar, ella está acompañada su esposo se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura, ellos son padres de 6 hijos ya están mayores y están casados, ellos viven junto a 2 nietos que ellos cuidan y están a su cargo.
	 
Ana sea dedicado por años a los oficios domésticos, comenta que gracias a su madre que le enseño este trabajo a la perfección, también se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde en su vivienda junto a su esposo tiene una granja desde hace ya 10 años, pues comentan que nunca se han quedado sin producción pues es una actividad que le generan buenos ingresos económicos a su familia y más aún que ya tienen una clientela segura para vender su producto. La demanda que tiene de pollos es demasiada y no le dan abasto es por ello que están solicitando el nuevo crédito. 

El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar 200 pollos de engorde, concentrado, vitamina, comedores, bebederos,  reparar la granja y pago de mano de obra.  Gracias a este préstamo podrá aumentar más su producción y cubrir la demanda de producto que tienen y también obtener mayores ganancias y mejorar su calidad de vida de ella y su familia.


Los sueños a futuro son tener una buena producción de pollos y poder venderlos empacados y distribuirlos en otros mercados, también desea que su negocio dure por muchos años y que sus hijos la puedan administrar su negocio, también remodelar un poco su casa y también que sus nietos sigan estudiando para que sean personas de bien en la sociedad todo esto dice que lo lograra con el préstamo y con futuros que solicitara.
texts.en:
Ana is 52 years old, and she did not have the opportunity to study because where she lived, there weren't any schools. She and her family had to leave the country because of the war that was taking place in the country, and also because her parents did not have enough money to send her to school. There were also several children, it was difficult to send them all to school to study. She lives with her husband who works in agriculture. They are parents to 6 children who are grown and married now. Ana and her husband live with 2 grandchildren that they take care of.

Ana has worked for years doing domestic chores; she says that her mother taught her to do these chores to perfection. She also works taking care of fattening chickens. She and her husband have had a farm on their property for 10 years, and they comment that they have never been without production- it is work that generates good income for her family, and they have regular clients to whom they sell their product. 

The demand for her chickens is too much and they cannot meet it, which is why she is requesting the new loan. She is requesting the loan to purchase 200 chickens to fatten, animal feed, vitamins, food and water troughs, to repair the farm and to pay for labor. Thanks to this loan, she will be able to increase her production and cover the demand that they have for their product, and also earn a higher income and improve her quality of life and that of her family.

Her future dreams are to have a good chicken production and to be able to sell packaged chickens and distribute them in other markets. She also hopes that her business will last for many more years, and that her children can manage her business. She also hopes to remodel her home a little bit, and hopes that her children will continue studying so that they can be good people in society. She says that she will reach her dreams with the loan and with future loans that she will request.

loans.use: to purchase 200 chickens to fatten, animal feed, vitamins and food and water troughs, to repair the farm and to pay labor.

loans.name: Zhanat

texts.en:
Zhanat is a freshman at the International and Business Law program, and this is his story:

“My name is Zhanat and I am a FLEX Alumnus. In 2012 I went to the U.S.A. with this exchange program and was so pleasantly surprised with the lifestyle of Americans, teaching methods used in schools and the beauty of the countryside. This experience influenced the desire to continue my education at an international university, be mobile and grow with the rest of the world. As AUCA meets all the requirements of the modern and prospective universities, I am confident that I made the right choice in this university.
I have a big family and we live in a village. My parents are retirees, so my brother supports me. However, my brother cannot cover 100% of my expenses as he has his own family. AUCA’s tuition fee is considered high in comparison with other universities’ fees in Kyrgyzstan. Last year, because of the lack of money, I could not enter AUCA and applied to another local university. I have lost one year and gained nothing by doing this, and I do not want to repeat that mistake this year.  I will study hard in order to get financial aid from AUCA and Kiva. I know that there are many borrowers from different countries, and as every individual, I want to build a prosperous future for my family and me, be able to influence our world in a good way. AUCA education offers a balanced mix of national and international standards, which is perfect and suitable for all prospective students”.

loans.use: to pay for his higher education.

loans.name: Blanca Estela

texts.es:
Blanca de 37 años de edad, alcanzo sus estudios hasta el 4º grado de educación básica. Es madre soltera de soltera de 2 hijos; un joven de 17 años y un bebe de 2 añitos.  Blanca se dedica a la venta de antojitos como yuca frita, pasteles, empanadas y nuégados. Trabajo que realiza en su casa de habitación, todas las tardes. 

Ella se ha dedicado a este negocio desde hace mucho tiempo, todo con el fin de sacar adelante a sus hijos. A medida ha pasado el tiempo a  Blanca le han llegado muchos clientes, es por eso que hoy en día quiso sacar un crédito para comprar algunos utensilios de cocina que están deteriorados y que le hacen falta , ella comprara cucharas, cacerolas y platos. Ademas invertirá en consumibles para sus ventas como aceite, plátanos, arroz, frijoles, entre otros. 

Ella cada día lucha por salir adelante, su principal sueño es ver su negocio en crecimiento, aumentar sus ventas; para así hacer frente a las responsabilidades crediticias adquiridas y a los gastos cotidianos que se enfrentan en el hogar. Trabaja muy arduamente para una buena educación de sus hijos para que en día futuro tengan un buen empleo y puedan valerse por si mismos.
texts.en:
Blanca, 37, studied up to the fourth grade of primary school. She is a single mother. She has two children who are 17 and 2. Blanca sells snacks, such as fried cassava, pies, empanadas and nuégados [a traditional Salvadorian dessert]. She works at home, in the afternoons.

Blanca has been doing this for a long time with the intention to make headway with her children. With time, Blanca’s customer base has grown, and this is why she wanted to request a loan to buy kitchen utensils, since she lacks some and the ones she has are deteriorated. She will buy spoons, pans and plates. She will also buy ingredients such as vegetable oil, plantain, rice and beans.

Blanca fights every day to get ahead. Her dream is to expand her business and increase her sales in order to be able to pay off her debts and cover the daily expenses. She works hard so that her children can study, have a good job and become independent in the future.

loans.use: to buy kitchen utensils such as spoons and pans, and ingredients such as plantains, rice and beans.

loans.name: Yousef

texts.en:
Yousef, age 17, is a student at a local university in Gaza City, where he lives with his family in a small, humble house. His father supports the family with the low wage that he earns as an employee in the public sector.

Yousef is studying accounting at the university. His goal is to obtain his BA, secure a good job, and improve the family's living conditions.
 
Yousef requested a loan from FATEN in order to buy a new laptop for his university studies. Through this loan, Yousef will be better able to complete homework assignments, perform research, and write his reports.

loans.use: to buy a laptop for his university studies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new modernized sewing machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a laptop for his university studies

loans.name: Amistad Cusqueña Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “AMISTAD CUSQUEÑA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia María continua con su negocio de venta de ropa interior como bóxer, calzoncillos, medias, entre otros, la socia lleva años de dedicándose  a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio la socia desea poder  seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de medias, para niñas, calzones entre otros.
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de libros, servicio de transporte urbano, carpintería, maestro albañil, venta de ropa y brindando el servicio de taxi.
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
Los socios que salen en la foto adjunta pideron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunion por motivos de trabajo.
texts.en:
This communal bank member belongs to the communal bank "Amistad Cusqueña" (Cusco Friendship). This bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province and department of Cusco.

Communal bank member Maria continues with her business of selling undergarments such as boxer shorts, underpants, and socks, among other items. She has been working in this business for years, and it is going very well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into her business every day. She wants to be able to continue working so that in this way she can continue supporting her family.

She is applying for the loan for the purchase of socks for girls and panties, among other items.

The other members work in businesses such as selling books, urban transportation services, carpentry, master bricklayer, selling clothing, and offering taxi service.

This bank member is grateful to those who form part of this dream through this means, and she promises to make her payments on the established schedule.

The members who appear in the attached photos asked permission to arrive late at the meeting for work reasons.

loans.use: to purchase socks for girls and panties, among other items.

loans.name: Shohruz

texts.ru: Шохруз молодой и перспективный человек. Он родился в 1995 году. Шохруз с детства учился в школе успешно и был активным учеником. Шохруз после окончания средней школе поступил в Национальный Университет. Данное время он является студентом 2 курса. Шохруз учится в Юридическом факультете. Он учится успешно и старается получить хорошее образование. Шохруз мечтает после окончания университета стать высококвалифицированным специалистом. Он обратился в ИМОН за займом в сумме 2200 долларов США для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Shohruz is a young and forward-looking person. He was born in 1995 and has always been an active student and successful in school. He entered the National University after graduating from high school and is currently a second-year student in the Law department. He is successful and is trying to get a good education. Shohruz dreams of becoming a highly qualified university graduate. He applied for a loan of $2,200 USD to pay for his tuition. He awaits your kindness and hopes for your compassion.

loans.use: To pay for his tuition

loans.name: Fatima

texts.ru: Фатима, 48 лет, замужем, мать двоих детей. У Фатимы среднее образование, вместе с супругом уже 18 лет занимаются животноводством и полеводством. На участке мерою 1,0 ГА собственной земли Фатима выращивает картофель, зерновые культуры и эспарцет для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Также в хозяйстве Фатимы имеется: 2 коровы, бычок, 5 овец и лошадь. Деятельность Фатимы приносит ей прибыль в размере 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. Фатима обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота, также в связи с тем, что поголовье увеличится, она на часть средств планирует построить сарай для скота.  Кредитные средства помогут Фатиме сохранить и приумножить поголовье, улучшить условия его содержания и получить здоровый приплод. Доходы от бизнеса она будет вкладывать в дальнейшее его развитие.
texts.en: Fatima is 48 years old, married and a mother of two children. Fatima has a secondary education and, together with her husband, has been involved in animal husbandry and farming for 18 years already. Fatima grows potatoes, cereal crops and sainfoin on her 1.0 hectares of land for the household consumption and sale. Fatima's business also contains 2 cows, a bull, 5 sheep and a horse. Fatima's business yields her a profit of 10,000 som (KGS) per month. Fatima requested a loan in the amount of 150,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy livestock and, since the livestock headcount will increase, to build a barn for the livestock. This loan will help Fatima retain and increase her livestock headcount, improve its conditions and get a healthy offspring. She will invest the earnings from the business into its further development.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock and build a barn for livestock

loans.name: Dilbara

texts.ru: Дильбара, 56 лет, разведена, есть дочь, единственная и самая любимая. У Дильбары - высшее образование, она работает в библиотеке, получая заработную плату в размере около 8,600 сом (KGS). Дочь Дильбары учится на третьем курсе университета на фармацевта, параллельно стажируется, тем самым помогая финансово матери. Дильбара имеет очень хорошие отзывы от своих соседей и коллег. Они отзываются о ней как о доброй и трудолюбивой женщине. Доход Дильбары служит основой для покрытия расходов на питание и бытовые нужды семьи. Она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на проведение ремонта, она купит радиаторы батарей, сделает ремонт в подвале. Часть средств, а именно 16,000 сом (KGS) Дильбара потратит на оплату за обучение дочери в университете. В будущем Дильбара планирует и дальше улучшать свои жилищные условия и тратить на обучение ее дочери.
texts.en: Dilbara is 56 years old, divorced and has a beloved daughter - her only one! Dilbara has a college degree, she works as a librarian and earns 8,600 som (KGS) monthly. Dilbara's daughter is a junior in college, majoring in Pharmacology, while moonlighting as a pharmacist to help her mother financially. Dilbara has a great reputation among her neighbors and colleagues. They all agree that she is a kinda and hard working woman. Dilbara's salary is enough to cover food and small household expenses. She turned to "Bai-Tushum" bank for a loan of 30,000 som (KGS), which she will use to buy heating radiators for her home and fix her cellar. A part of the loan, specifically 16,000 som (KGS) Dilbara will use to pay her daughter's college tuition. In the future Dilbara plans to continue improving her living space and invest in her daughter's education.

loans.use: to purchase radiators and repair her cellar, as well to pay for her daughters' education

loans.name: María Sonia

texts.es:
María de 61 años de edad, solo estudio 4 grado.  Esta casada el esposo desde hace mucho tiempo se dedica a la agricultura y los hijos trabajan, pero ya todos tienen su propio hogar.
María se dedica a la ganadería desde hace más de 25 años, lo aprendió con su padre.  Ella es una mujer luchadora y  a pesar de la edad ella tiene ganado con el cual ella se sustenta en lo que es la alimentación el ganado lo tiene cerca de su casa y en el negocio se involucra el esposo y un corralero que tiene permanente los siete días de la semana.
El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar pasto para estar preparada en el verano ya que escasea y así mantener el ganado gordo y que le den la misma producción de leche que le producen en  la época de invierno.
Su sueño es tener más ganado, y utilizar las ganancias en compra de vitaminas para el ganado y para comprar su alimentación y la de su esposo.
texts.en:
Maria is 61 years old, and she only studied through 4th grade. She is married, and her husband has worked in agriculture for a long time. Her children work, but they all have their own homes now.

Maria has worked raising cattle for more than 25 years, and she learned this from her father. She is a fighter and despite her age, she has cattle with which she supports herself. The cattle has food close to her house, and she involves her husband in her business. She also permanently has a stable, seven days a week.

She is requesting this loan to purchase grass to be ready for the summer when it gets scarce, and to keep her cattle fat so that they give her the same amount of milk as they produce in the winter. 

Her dream is to have more cattle, and to use the profits to purchase vitamins for the cattle and to buy food for her and her husband.

loans.use: to purchase grass to be prepared for the scarcity in the summer, and keep her cattle fat this way.

loans.name: Twunganire Iii Group

texts.fr:
Lydie fait partie du groupe  TwunganireIII et  habite à  Bujumbura. Elle a 28 ans et est mariée à Onesphore, un enseignant.
Elle a sous sa charge 2 enfants membres de sa famille élargie, qui étudient. 

Elle fait le commerce du  riz, du haricot, et du sel...  depuis  2 ans. 

Elle est à son troisième   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de riz, de sel, de haricot,…  à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait  investir dans l’agriculture.
texts.en:
Lydie is part of Twunganire III Group and lives in Bujumbura. She is 28 years old and is married to Onesphore, a teacher. She has two young members of her extended family in her care, who attend school.

Lydie has been selling rice, beans, salt, etc. for two years. She is on her third loan with Turame. With the Kiva loan she is receiving, she is going to increase her capital and purchase a large quantity of rice, salt, beans, etc. to sell in order to earn more.

In the coming years, Lydie would like to invest in agriculture.

loans.use: To increase her capital and purchase a large quantity of rice, salt, beans, etc. to sell in order to earn more.

loans.name: Antoinette Léonce

texts.fr: Antoinette est âgée de 41 ans. Elle est  Mariée et vit avec  ses  deux enfants à Attiégou.  Ils se nourrissent  deux fois par jour. Elle a un niveau d’étude primaire. Elle est commerçante d’œufs, de pagnes et de détergent depuis  2003 jusqu’à ce jour. A propos des œufs, elle s’approvisionne auprès des éleveurs venus de Vogan quatre (04) fois par mois. Elle fait une vente ambulante. Elle désire avoir un soutien financier pour accroitre son activité génératrice de revenus pour aider son foyer à mieux s’en sortir dans les dépenses quotidiennes et maximiser de profits.
texts.en: Antoinette is 41. She is married and lives with her two children in Attiegou. They eat twice a day. She went to school at the primary level. She has been selling eggs, traditional pagne fabric, and detergent since 2003, and until this day. As for the eggs, she buys her stock from the farmers that come from Vogan four times every month. She makes her sales as an itinerant saleswoman. She requests financial support to increase her money making activity in order to help her household better manage daily expenses and to maximize her profits.

loans.use: to buy 32 trays of eggs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy compost for his crops

loans.name: Nilufar

texts.ru: Нилуфар мать 3 несовершеннолетних детей. Ее муж трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации и поэтому она сама справляется со всеми заботами детей. Нилуфар очень нуждалась в источнике дохода и поэтому она начала свой новый бизнес купле продажей детской одежды месяц назад. Она торгует на местном рынке, где взяла в аренду точку продажи. Данное время она продает зимние детские одежды, как комбинезоны, теплые жемперы и т.д. Нилуфар с бизнесом справляется сама. Она хочет расширить ассортимент товара и с такой целью она запрашивает займ на сумму 10000 сомони для покупки детской одежды для увеличения ассортимента товара. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Nilufar is a mother of three young children. Her husband is a migrant worker in Russia and Nilufar takes care of her kids by herself. Nilufar desperately needed an additional source of income, so she started a new business a month ago - she sells children's clothing. Nilufar rents a market stall at the local market. Currently she sells winter clothes, such as snow suits, warm sweaters etc. She manages her business on her own. Nilufar wants to expand her inventory and is requesting a loan of 10,000 somoni to purchase more clothes and increase the variety of items she can offer. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: to buy a batch of children clothes, for her new business

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is a married woman with eight children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Julieta is 51 years old and has two children who are still in school.

Julieta has a buy-and-sell dried coconut meat business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 14,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase more sacks of dried coconut meat to sell.

Julieta has been in this business for ten years. In the future, she would like to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of dried coconut meat to sell.

loans.name: Cirila

texts.en:
Cirila works hard to support her family. She is married and has a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Cirila has requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs. She has been in this business for 5 years now.

Cirila would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Zosimo

texts.en:
Zosimo, age 63, earns his living by fattening pigs. He has been engaged in this enterprise for 10 years, and he has borrowed 11 times in the past from NWTF to sustain his business.

He and his wife have four children.  

Zosimo requested a loan in the amount of PhP 18,000 loan through NWTF. He will use his loan funds to buy feed and vitamins for his pigs.

In the future, he would like to save sufficient money to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia works hard to support her family. Lydia is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Lydia requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell to her customers.

Lydia has been in this business for 10 years now.

Lydia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell to her customers

loans.name: Conegonda

texts.en:
Conegonda is 68 years old and widowed with seven children.  

Conegonda is in the agricultural business, fattening pigs in the Philippines. Conegonda requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Conegonda has been in pig fattening for two years now and has borrowed 15 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Conegonda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en:
Nelly is 53 years old and married with two children. Nelly works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 14,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more items like candies, snack foods, canned goods, biscuits, dried fish, cooking oil, noodles, etc., to sell.

Nelly has borrowed and repaid four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from farming vegetables. Nelly aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items like candies, snack foods, canned goods, biscuits, dried fish, cooking oil, noodles, etc. to sell

loans.name: Nora

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Nora works hard to support her family. She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming vegetables. Nora is borrowing 20,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell in her fish stall for her fish vending business.

Nora has been sustaining her business activities through her past 8 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell in her fish stall

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy two cows in order to increase her livestock headcount and milk volumes

loans.name: Cindy Andrea

texts.es:
Cindy es una joven de 22 años quien junto con su esposo aprovecharon una oportunidad de adquirir un vehículo e ir pagándolo por cuotas, para que su esposo dejara de trabajarle a terceros y pudieran tener mayor utilidad para su hogar. 
Son dos jóvenes muy emprendedores que ahora solicitan un crédito que invertirán en el mantenimiento del vehículo reparando silletería, pintándolo y realizándole algunos mantenimientos electrónicos pues el transporte de pasajeros es muy delicado y quieren tener un carro competente y con todas las normas para prestar el servicio.
Cindy pide apoyo para impulsar el proyecto de dos jóvenes que buscan una calidad de vida y sostenibilidad en su trabajo.
texts.en:
Cindy is a young, 22 year old woman who, with her husband, took advantage of an opportunity to acquire a vehicle and pay it off in quotas so that her husband can stop working for others and so that they can have more income for their home. 

They are two very enterprising young people who are now requesting a loan that they will invest to perform maintenance on their vehicle, repairing the seats, painting it and performing some electronic maintenance. Transporting passengers is very delicate, and they want to have a functional car that meets all of the standards to render this service.

CIndy is requesting support to drive forward the project of two young people who are looking for a higher quality of life, and sustainability in their work.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on her vehicle, paint it, change the seats and perform electric maintenance.

loans.name: Hanifan

texts.en:
Hanifan is a 52-year-old woman.  She is a humble and hard-working woman.  She needs to earn more income to provide a better standard of living to her family members. 

She is involved in a business selling animals. She looks after the cattle and is responsible for feeding them. The business is providing her with enough income to support her family. 

In order to expand her earnings, Hanifan has requested a loan amount of 40,000 PKR to buy animals for resale purposes. She is hopeful that expanding the business will help in improving her family’s living standards.

loans.use: to buy animals for resale purposes.

loans.name: Alexander Isahias

texts.es:
Alexander de 19 años de edad, es un joven muy trabajador. Trabaja en una carpintería como carpintero, él estudio hasta bachillerato no continuo sus estudios en la universidad debido a que a su novia la saco embarazada y tubo que responsabilizarse del bebe, él no estaba lo suficientemente maduro para ser papá, fue muy difícil para él pero gracias a la ayuda de su padre ha salido adelante.

 Actualmente vive acompañado con la madre del bebe, que ella está estudiando y también es cosmetóloga. Viven en la vivienda de su madre.

Alexander su principal actividad es la carpintería, comenta que tiene ya 5 años de trabajar en ella, la carpintería no es de él, sino de un tío que le dio la oportunidad de trabajar y gracias a su empeño y dedicación a aprendido mucho y él quiere iniciarse con su propio taller pues en la zona donde vive hay mucha demanda y él quiere aprovecharla, también en los tiempos libres sale con su  padre a vender frutas, verduras, lácteos y mariscos, pues es otra actividad a parte de la carpintería que le genera ingresos a su familia, la carpintería está cerca de su casa no tiene que viajar, solo cuando sale con su padre a vender es que sale lejos pero regresan el mismo día.


El préstamo que está solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar una pulidora, un taladro, un cepillo eléctrico, un martillo, un serrucho  y un poco de madera para iniciar sus trabajos. Gracias al préstamo él podrá tener su propio taller y hacer sus propios trabajos pues dice que es una actividad que le genera buenos ingresos económicos para él y su familia.

Alexander desea para el futuro tener su propio taller bien equipado para hacer buenos trabajos, también desea que su compañera de vida siga estudiando al igual que su hija, también construir su propia casa para ya no estar junto en la  casa de su madre y también él no descarta la posibilidad de seguir estudiando y terminar una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Alexander is nineteen years old and a very hard worker. He works at a carpentry shop as a carpenter. He finished high school and didn't go on to university because he got his girlfriend pregnant and had to take responsibility for the baby. He wasn't mature enough to become a father so it was very hard for him, but thanks to his father's help he has managed to get ahead. He is currently living with the baby's mother, who is going to school and is also a cosmetologist. They live in her mother's house.

Alexander has been working as a carpenter for five years now. The shop doesn't belong to him but to one of his uncles, who gave him a chance to work there. Thanks to his hard work and dedication he learned a lot and wants to start his own workshop. There is a lot of demand in the area where he lives and he wants to make the most of it. On his days off he also goes out with his father to sell fruit, vegetables, dairy products, and seafood, which is a way for him to supplement his family's income. The carpentry shop is near his home so he doesn't have to travel far. He only goes far away when he goes out with his father to sell, but they always come back the same day.

He will use the loan he is requesting from CrediCampo to buy a polisher, a drill, an electric brush, a hammer, a saw, and some wood to start working. This loan will allow him to have his own workshop and work on his own jobs. He says this business generates a good income for himself and his family.

In the future, Alexander wants to have his business fully equipped so that he can perform well on the jobs. He also wants his girlfriend to stay in school and for his daughter to have an education. He also wants to build his own house so that they can live on their own, and he doesn't discard the possibility of going back to school himself and pursuing a college degree.

loans.use: to buy tools to start his own carpentry workshop.

loans.name: Emilsen Ofelia

texts.es:
El emprendimiento es una medida que están adoptando las madres solteras cabeza de hogar como Emilsen que a sus 37 años de edad y viendo su situación como madre que tiene que hacerse cargo de sus 2 hijas de 15 y 10 años de edad y su hijo menor de 8, vio en su casa una gran idea para salir adelante y es implementar un servicio de internet, impresión y escáner con lo que ha cubierto sus necedades básicas aparte que en sus ratos libres o tiempos muertos trabaja en su máquina de confección reparando prendas. 
Ante la buna acogida por parte del público de sus servicios Emilsen quiere solicitar un crédito que usara para la compra de una cpu y un procesador. 
Este crédito le permitirá atender más generando mayor utilidad que le será de gran ayuda para el pago de las cuotas y ahorrar para seguir ampliándose y contar con más equipos.
Su prioridad  es poder mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y pagar la educación de sus hijos
texts.en:
Single mothers working as heads of households are adopting entrepreneurship measures, including Emilsen. Emilsen is 37 years old, and has had to be responsible for her two daughters who are 15 and 10 years old, and for her youngest son who is 8 years old. Looking at her situation, she saw a great idea to get ahead that was in her house, which was to implement an internet, printing and scanning service, with which she has covered her basic needs. Also, in her free time, she works at her sewing machine repairing clothing.

Faced with the warm welcome from the public for her services, Emilsen wants to request a loan that she will use to purchase a CPU and a processor. This loan will allow her to assist her clients more, earning more income that will be helpful to pay her quotas and to save, to continue expanding and have more computers. Her priority is to improve the conditions of her home, and to pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase a CPU and a processor to have another computer in her internet cafe, which currently has two.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her tuition fee.

loans.name: Afi Victoire

texts.fr: Victoire est âgée de 35 ans et est née à Vogan. Elle est mariée. Elle vit  à Lomé dans  le quartier Attiégou. Elle vit avec son mari et  leurs 4 enfants. Ils mangent  une fois au plus par jour. Elle est analphabète. Depuis 1998 jusqu'à ce jour, Victoire vend du savon, du maïs et du charbon. Elle s’approvisionne au près des fournisseurs du quartier et mène une activité ambulante. Elle désire avoir un soutien financier pour accroître son activité génératrice de revenus pour aider son foyer à mieux s’en sortir dans les dépenses quotidiennes et maximiser de profits. Elle sollicite donc ce crédit pour acheter 2 sacs du charbon de bois et 40 bols de maïs.
texts.en:
Victoire is 35 years old and was born in Vogan. She is married. She lives in Lomé, in the Attiégou neighborhood, with her husband and their four children. They eat once per day.

Victoire is illiterate. Since 1998, she has been selling soap, corn, and charcoal. She gets her supplies from the local providers and runs a mobile business. She wants to have [enough] financial support to grow her business to help her household better cope with the day-to-day expenses and maximize profits. This is why Victoire is seeking this loan to purchase two sacks of charcoal and 40 bowls of corn.

loans.use: To purchase two sacks of charcoal and 40 bowls of corn.

loans.name: Noor

texts.en:
Noor is a 48-year-old married woman. She has three children. 

Eight years ago she started a small business selling animals. She buys different animals such as baby goats, sheep, and calves at a lower price and after raising them a year or two, her husband sells them out in the market for a profit. 

In order to increase her sales, she has applied for a loan of 50,000 PKR through Kashf Foundation. It will allow her to purchase more animals which ultimately helps in generating more income for the family.

loans.use: to purchase more animals which ultimately helps in generating more income for the family.

loans.name: Carlos Eduardo

texts.es:
Carlos Eduardo tiene 23 años, nació en la ciudad de El Alto del Departamento de La Paz, él nos comenta que su familia es sencilla y humilde pero muy trabajadora, su padre es carpintero y su madre es ama de casa, ambos, pese a las limitaciones económicas que tuvieron a lo largo de su vida, lograron educar a sus ocho hijos, de los cuales cinco ya son profesionales y tres continúan estudiando. 

Al salir bachiller, Carlos decidió estudiar a nivel técnico la carrera de Mecánica Industrial, posteriormente al culminar sus estudios, empezó a trabajar en un taller de soldadura y está buscando su especialización en el área en la cual se desenvuelve, es por esto que decide capacitarse en procesos de soldadura, sin embargo no puede cubrir los costos de sus estudios, por tal motivo ha solicitado un crédito educativo. 

Carlos, agradece a las personas que a través de sus recursos económicos le permitirán seguir estudiando y cumplir sus sueños de ser un excelente profesional y montar su propio taller mecánico para dar la oportunidad a más jóvenes de contar con un trabajo, además de retribuir todo el esfuerzo que hicieron sus padres.
texts.en:
Carlos Eduardo is 23 years old and was born in the city of El Alto in the state of La Paz. He tells us that his family is modest and humble, but very hardworking. His father is a carpenter and his mother is a housewife. Despite their financial limitations through the years, they managed to educate their eight children, of whom five are already professionals and three are still studying.

When he finished high school, Carlos decided to go to vocational school and study Industrial Mechanics. Later, after finishing his studies, he began to work at a welding shop and is going for a specialization in the field in which he works. That is why he decided to take training in soldering and welding processes; however, he can't cover the cost of his studies, so he has applied for an educational loan.  

Carlos is grateful to the people who, with their financial resources, enable him to continue studying and achieve his dreams of becoming an excellent professional. He hopes to start his own mechanic shop and give other young men the opportunity to have a job, as well as give back to his parents for all their hard work.

loans.use: To pay for a technical course in Soldering and SMAW (Arc welding) Processes

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Afi est née  à Vogan en 1959 et vit dans le quartier de Bè. . Elle est mariée et de quatre enfants. Elle fait le commerce de l’alimentation générale depuis 1994, elle achète ses produits au grand marché et revend au marché de son quartier et au même grand marché de Lomé. Elle souhaite  acheter 2 cartons de spaghettis, 2 cartons de couscous 500 grammes et 1 carton de sardine. Elle s’approvisionne 2 fois par semaines. Crédit lui permettra d’augmenter ses gains et payer les frais scolaires de ses enfants.
texts.en: Afi was born in Vogan in 1959. She lives in the Bè neighborhood. She is married and has four children. She has been selling food items since 1994.  She stocks up at the main market and resells at her own neighborhood market as well as at the same main market of Lomé. She would like to buy two boxes of pasta, two   of couscous in 500-g [one-pound] packs and one box of sardines. She stocks up twice a week. This loan will allow her to increase her revenues and pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to buy two boxes of pasta, two boxes of couscous and one box of sardines so as to increase her sales and be able to pay her children's school fees.

loans.name: Zulaykho

texts.en:
Zulaykho is 36 years old. She is a capable enterprising woman. Zulaikho lives in the district of Temurmalik with her husband, two sons and two daughters. The eldest daughter graduated high school this year; she helps Zulaikho in her work. The other children are still in school. 

Zulaykho makes a living offering sewing services; she takes orders and works at a workshop. She had been engaged in this activity for more than 7 years. Zulaikho tries to work harder to provide for the family. At present she needs to buy a new sewing machine to create a good working environment and to continue the activities. She really needs this loan and hopes for your responsiveness.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine

loans.name: Shohsaidhon

texts.ru: 35-year old Shohsaidhon is a native of the southern district Shahritus. He is married to Mukaddas and they have three wonderful children. Eldest daughter is 6 years old, and sons are 4 and 1 years. He currently works part-time as a repairman houses, but this work is seasonal and in winter he does not work at all. So Shohsaidhon decided to start a new business in order to provide his family with source of income. He had already acquired a retail outlet in the local market, and there he is going to sell almonds. Shohsaidhon plans to buy almonds from the neighboring village. His wife will help him in the new business. Now Shohsaidhon needs some funds to buy goods and start trading. Therefore he apply for a loan and hopes for your support.
texts.en:
Shohsaidhon, age 35, currently repairs houses to earn an income. However, this work is part-time and seasonal, and in winter he does not work at all. In order to support his growing family, he needs to earn a better living. For this reason, Shohsaidhon has decided to start a new business in order to provide his family with a secure source of income. He intends to sell almonds at the local market.

Shohsaidhon is a native of a southern district of Tajikistan called Shahrituz. He and his wife Mukaddas have three wonderful children: a six-year old daughter, a four-year-old son, and a one-year-old baby boy. 

Shohsaidhon has already acquired a retail outlet at the local market for his new enterprise. He plans to buy almonds from the neighboring village and sell them at market with the help of his wife. 

He requires some funding in order to buy goods and start trading. He has therefore applied for a loan. He is hopeful that he will receive your support and is grateful for your help.

loans.use: to buy almonds to offer for sale at the market

loans.name: Natividad

texts.es: La señora Natividad tiene 40 años de edad, logro estudiar hasta el nivel de bachillerato, tiene 4 hijos de los cuales 3 ya son independientes y trabajan por cuenta propia, solo uno de sus hijos depende de sus ingresos, su esposo le ayuda con la atención de las fotocopiadoras que tiene, esto se debe a que el esposo se dedica al mantenimiento y reparación de fotocopiadoras en lo cual ya lleva bastante tiempo y se caracteriza por la buena calidad de su trabajo, gracias al sacrificio realizado por ambos, lograron que 3 de sus hijos salgan profesionales y puedan tener un futuro estable, el motivo del presente crédito es para poder refaccionar su vivienda ya que es un poco antigua y varias partes de las paredes se están derrumbando, además de poder hacer vaciar el piso del garaje y poder cambiar las tejas del techo debido a que existen goteras, de esta forma le brindara a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Natividad is 40 years old and studied up until high school. She has 4 children, 3 of whom are already independent and are self-employed. Only one of her children is dependent on her income.

Her husband helps her take care of the photocopiers that she has, because he devotes his time to maintenance and repair of photocopiers. He has been doing so for some time and is known for the high quality of his work. Thanks to the sacrifices both have made, they managed to give 3 of their children a career and they can have a stable future. 

The purpose of the current loan is to repair her home, because it is an older home and some parts of the walls are falling down. She would also like to put a cement floor down in the garage and change out the roof tiles because there are leaks. That way, she can provide her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: Repair her home, because it is an older home, so she can provide her family with better living conditions.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for a law degree.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase compost for his cocoa plants.

loans.name: Nienta Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Nienta  est composé de 2 femmes monogames et 2 polygames. Elles ont en moyenne 34ans et 4 enfants. Elles habitent toutes à Sabalibougou l’un des quartiers de Bamako et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage. Les membres du groupe font le petit commerce du, poisson, du bois de charbon, des grains de céréales et d’habits. Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont décidé de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 4èmecycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Mamou (femme assise en 2ème position de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo) a une grande réputation dans la vente des poissons. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 3 paniers de poissons en gros au quartier du fleuve de Bamako. La revente se fait en détails à Sabalibougou à une clientèle mixte. Madame Mamou espère réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 140 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinvesti dans l’activité. Elle a pour objectif d’acheter un lot à usage d’habitation dans cette relation avec Soro Yiriwaso.
texts.en:
The group Nienta is composed of two monogamous women and two polygamous. They average 34 years of age and four children each. They live in Sabalibougou, a district of Bamako. And they know one another through community ties. The group members work in small-scale commerce involving fish, charcoal, grains, and clothing. 

With the goal of increasing their business funds, the group members decided to collaborate with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their fourth solidarity loan cycle. 

Ms. Mamou (the woman sitting second from the right in the photo) is famous for selling fish. She intends to use her loan to purchase 3 baskets of fish wholesale in the river district of Bamako. Her sales are made at the retail level to a mixed customer base in Sabalibougou. 

With this loan, Ms. Mamou hopes to make an average monthly profit 140,000 francs CFA that will be used for reinvesting in her business.  Her goal is to purchase a plot of residential land through this relationship with Soro Yiriwaso.

loans.use: to purchase fish

loans.name: Rochel

texts.en:
Rochel is 35 years old and married with two children.

Rochel works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 13,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

Rochel has borrowed and repaid six loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from fish vending.

Rochel aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Lina

texts.en:
Lina is 54 years old and has four children. She is married and one of her children is still in school.

Lina is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed, vaccines and vitamins for her pigs.

Lina has been raising pigs for eight years now and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccines and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Monaliza

texts.en:
Monaliza is 27 years old, married, and has two children. She operates a pig fattening business in the Philippines, which she has been doing for four years. She earns additional income from motorcycle transport.

Monaliza requested her second loan from NWTF for 29,000 PHP, which she will use to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies for her pigs. She hopes to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase feeds, vitamins, and other supplies for her pigs

loans.name: Joselieta

texts.en:
Joselieta is 54 years old, married, and has four children who are in school.

Joselieta is in the agricultural business, pig fattening, in the Philippines. Joselieta requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional piglets, feeds and other supplies for her business.

Joselieta has been in pig fattening for 5 years now, and has borrowed 2 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Joselieta would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets, feeds and other supplies for her business

loans.name: Zheenbubu

texts.ru: Жээнбубу 49 лет, замужем, 2 детей, образование среднее. С 2003 года занимается полеводством и животноводством, на 4,0 ГА собственной земли Жээнбубу выращивает клевер для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Жээнбубу знает технологию ведения сельскохозяйственной деятельности и умеет вкладывать средства по назначению. В ее хозяйстве есть 1 корова и 10 овец. Ежемесячный совокупный доход Жээнбубу составляет около 15,000 сом (KGS). Жээнбубу обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойных коров. Жээнбубу намерена и далее развивать свое хозяйство, а прибыль от бизнеса она будет откладывать на улучшение жилищных условий ее семьи.
texts.en: Zheenbubu is 49, married, and has two children.  She has the equivalent of a high school education, and has grown crops and raised livestock since 2003.  She currently has one cow and ten sheep on her farm, and grows clover on 4.0 hectares of her own land both for her own use and as a cash crop, while her monthly income is roughly 15,000 som.  Zheenbubu is seeking a loan of 120,000 som from Bai Tushum Bank to buy some dairy cows.  She's familiar with everything needed to run a farm, and will have no problems using the loan to this end.  She intends to continue expanding her farm in the future, and hopes to set aside some money to improve her family's living conditions as well.

loans.use: buy additional cows to increase her livestock headcount

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is a married and is blessed with one child who attends school. They live at their own house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees.

Grace operates a tailoring business, making women’s and men's suits for sale at home. She cites seasonality and stiff competition from other tailoring operators as her major challenges. 

With the Kshs 25,000 she wants to purchase material and sewing thread for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase material and sewing thread for her business

loans.name: Diego León

texts.es:
El señor Diego desde muy joven se dedico a las funciones del campo tales como agricultura y ganadería, actividades que le enseño su padre para que saliera adelante en su vida.

Hoy en día su actividad principal es la agricultura y la ganadería y tiene como objetivo mejorar su capital comprando 2 vacas que le permitan abastecerse y generar mejores ingresos, y esta es la razón por la cual solicita un préstamo.

Es padre responsable y amoroso con sus hijos, vive en una finca con ellos y su esposa quien ha sido su más grande compañía.

Sueña con poder otorgarles a sus hijos una educación de calidad para que más adelante se puedan defender solos y sean independientes.

Todos los días asiste su negocio y procura por hacer las cosas muy bien.
texts.en:
Diego has been working as a farmer ever since he was very young. His father taught him how to tend to the crops and cattle so that he could get ahead in life. Today he is still a farmer and a cattle rancher. His current business goal is to improve his capital by purchasing two cows. This will mean more resources for him, and a chance to generate more income. That is why he is requesting a loan.

He is a responsible and loving father to his children and lives in the country with them and his wife, who has always been his best companion. His dream is to be able to give his children a good education so that they can fend for themselves one day and become independent.

He tends to his business every day and strives to do things right.

loans.use: to buy two cows.

loans.name: Anagil

texts.es:
Anagil  de 38 años de edad, solo estudio 3 grado ya que por falta de apoyo de sus padres no pudo seguir estudiando, porque los ingresos económicos de ese tiempo no alcanzaban para darle el estudio. Está casada,   la pareja se dedica a la agricultura en todo tipo de cultivos ya que es un medio de como darle la alimentación a su familia y sus 3 hijas viven con ellos. 

Ella trabaja como empleada doméstica desde hace diez años, servicio que presta en el hogar de una señora de la zona,  ya que por su humildad y honestidad se ha mantenido con el trabajo, su  hogar está a 5 kilómetros  de distancia y su horario de trabajo es de 7 am a 4 pm.

El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar fertilizantes y abonos para su cosecha de maíz. 
Su deseo es prosperar con su familia y tener una mejor calidad de vida y que todas  sus hijas sean profesionales de éxito.
texts.en:
Anagil, age 38, only completed the third grade.  Because of the lack of support from her parents, she was not able to continue her education.  This is because their financial income at this time was not enough to give her an education.

She is married, and her life partner works in agriculture growing all types of crops.  It is a way to give her family food.  Her three daughters live with them.

She has worked as a domestic employee for ten years.  She provides her service in a woman’s home in the area.  Because of her humility and honesty she has kept the job.  Her home is five kilometers away, and her work schedule is from seven a.m. until four p.m.

The loan she is requesting is to buy fertilizers and compost for her corn crop.

Her wish is for her family to prosper and have a better quality of life.  She wants all of her daughters to become successful professionals.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and compost for her corn crop.

loans.name: Hatixhe

texts.en: Hatixhe needs your help again; she is seeking 100,000 Albanian Lek to make some more repairs to her house, seen in the background of this photo. She very much appreciates your previous help.

loans.use: to make more repairs to her house

loans.name: Najma

texts.en:
Najma is a 32-year-old married woman. She and her husband (also shown in the photo) have been running a school for six years. In this time, they have consistently increased student enrollment to get to where they are now, which is close to 400 students, more than half of whom are girls. Recently, they have also started a girls' college for girls who graduate from their school and want to study further. 

Najma's management skills and her commitment to providing quality education have made her school a success story in the community. She requires a loan of 100,000 PKR to purchase desks for her students and a water filter.  Najma wants to provide her students with the best school environment possible.

loans.use: to purchase desks for her students and a water filter.

loans.name: Shahid

texts.en:
