Elle est revendeuse des produits de premières nécessité et s’approvisionne 4 fois par mois au marché d’Agoè-Assiyeye. Egnoname à un niveau primaire. Afin d’augmenter l’étalage et de réduire les coûts d’approvisionnement, Egnoname sollicite ce crédit pour acheter 1 sac de riz et un bidon d'huile végétale.
texts.en:
Egnoname is a 27-year-old Togolese women and is single. She lives in Lomé, in the Adidogomé neighborhood. She sells essential goods and gets her supplies four times per month from the Agoè-Assiyeye market. She attended elementary school.

In order to expand her stall and reduce her supply costs, Egnoname is seeking this loan to purchase one sack of rice and one container of vegetable oil.

loans.use: To purchase one sack of rice and one container of vegetable oil.

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en: Naomi is a maize farmer from Yan Gwari village. Before she became a Babban Gona member, Naomi would have had to sell her maize for low prices soon after harvest, to meet her immediate cash needs. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Naomi can now store her maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. When asked, Naomi said: “I would now be able use this extra income to expand my farmland, and eventually, I hope to ensure other members of my community are lifted out of poverty.”

loans.use: to meet urgent expenses like child school fees, food and farm loan repayment, eliminating pressure to sell corn at low prices and increasing income by up to 37%.

loans.name: Ilda

texts.en:
Ilda is married, and she has 5 children. There are seven members in the family: her 5 children and including her husband. 

She is requesting a loan of $800 from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her business. She will use the loan to buy some additional supplies to keep in her kiosk such as biscuits, sardines, noodles and other POP things to sell including soft drinks. 

Ilda started to open her kiosk in 1999 with her own working capital of $150. She hopes to open a bigger store in the future, so she is taking this loan to improve her management for her business. She is happy with the loan that was offered by Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital to buy more goods.

loans.use: To buy biscuits, sardines, noodles and other POP things to sell including soft drinks.

loans.name: Mayer Karen

texts.es:
Mayer es una mujer de 30 años de edad, casada, tiene tres hijos de tres, seis y ocho años, y su negocio es la venta de embutidos.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, independiente, responsable y trabajadora. Su trabajo lo realiza en la zona de ‘El Torno’; lugar caracterizado por el crecimiento de su población por inmigrantes lugareños y del occidente del país, de clima cálido tropical con una temperatura ambiente de 30 grados centígrados.
Mayer es de tez trigueña, cabello castaño largo peinado a la moda, su lengua materna es el español y conoce el guaraní por herencia familiar. Su vida la realiza con su esposo que se dedica al transporte y sus tres hijos, los dos mayores estudian en la escuela, todos viven en una casa propia de ladrillo y cuentan con los servicios de luz y agua potable. Su negocio es la venta de embutidos como, jamón, mortadela, pasta de hígado, etc. Y lo realiza en su domicilio donde tiene una tienda de embutidos, su negocio carece de refrigerador por lo que tiene que comprar embutidos por menor para abastecer la venta diaria, esto le resta tiempo y gasta mucho en transporte, alguna vez sus productos se malograron por el calor intenso del lugar. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en tres años que lleva en el negocio. Su sueño es tener a sus hijos profesionales. Ella desea ampliar su negocio realizando una inversión con la compra de una heladera con mostrador, para mantener sus productos refrigerados y a la vista de los clientes, esto le ayudaría a realizar menos viajes y tener más tiempo para dedicarle a su familia.
Es por esos motivos que Mayer solicita un préstamo para la ampliación de su negocio comprando un refrigerador con mostrador y el tiempo que gane lo ocupara en compartirlo con sus hijos.
texts.en:
Mayer, age 30, has three children, ages three, six, and eight years. Her business is selling deli meats.

Mayer is a good mother. She is enterprising, independent, responsible, and hard-working. She works in the 'El Torno' region, a place characterized by its growing immigrant population, both from nearby places and from the western part of the country. The area has a tropical climate with an average temperature of 30C (86 F).  Mayer herself has olive skin and fashionably styled dark hair. Her first language is Spanish and she also speaks Guaraní thanks to her family's heritage.  She lives with her husband, who is in the transportation business, and their three children, the older two of whom are in school. They all live together in their own brick home and have services including electricity and drinkable water.

Her business is selling deli meats such as ham, bologna, liver paste, etc. She does her sales out of a room in her home. She doesn't have a refrigerator for her business, though, which forces her to buy deli meats at retail prices and stock her business on a daily basis. This takes a lot of time and costs a lot in transportation. Sometimes her products even go bad because of the intense heat in the area.

This is her first sequence of loans with the institution in the three years she's been in the business. Her dream is to have her children become professionals. She will use this loan to expand her business by investing in the purchase of a cooler with a showcase so that her products stay refrigerated and can be seen by her customers. This will help her make fewer trips and spend more time with her family. She is particularly looking forward to spending more time with her children.

loans.use: buy a refrigerating showcase for her business selling meats

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es: Antonio de 64 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, el posee un puesto de venta de ropa y productos de uso personal desde hace 6 años, tiene muchos clientes por la variedad de productos y por los buenos precios, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar los gastos de su hogar,  el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de ropa para damas y caballeros, perfumes, cremas, cosméticos, lociones, etc. y asi poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Antonio is 64 years old and lives in his own house with his life companion. He has had a stall selling clothing and personal use products for 6 years. He has a lot of clients because of his variety of products and for his good prices. With his sales he manages to pay the household expenses. He is requesting a loan to buy clothing for women and men, perfume, creams, cosmetics, lotions, etc. so that he can have greater income.

loans.use: to buy men's and women's clothing, perfume, creams, cosmetics, lotions, etc.

loans.name: Emelita

texts.en:
Emelita is 51 years old and married with four children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She has run a retail charcoal business for 1 year and requests 11,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

Emelita has borrowed and repaid 12 previous loans from NWTF. She earns additional income from selling root crops.

Emelita aspires to build and expand her business in order to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Meriam

texts.en:
Meriam is a married woman with  seven children who works hard to support her family.

She has a retail charcoal business in the Philippines, and  earns additional income raising pigs. Meriam requests 14,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and requests another loan to further build her business.

Meriam has been sustained her business  through 21 previous loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream which is to save enough money  to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Gloria Eloina

texts.es:
Un almacén de ropa infantil es lo que quiere administrar la señora Gloría quien solicita un crédito para iniciar formalmente su negocio de venta de ropa para bebes, esta sonriente mujer quiere iniciar este negocio ya que necesita una manera para generar ingresos pues desde que se separó de su esposo la vida ha sido difícil y quiere levantarse de ese golpe, generándose la oportunidad de crecer y tener un negocio que aspira a que tenga muchos clientes creando buenos lazos con sus clientes.
Con el crédito comprara surtido de ropa para bebes y niños hasta los 3 años de edad y aspira a que este sea el impulso que necesita su vida para ser exitosa.
texts.en:
A store selling baby clothing is what Gloria wants to run. She is requesting a loan to formally start a business selling clothing for babies. This smiling woman wants to start this business as she needs a way to generate income, Since she separated from her husband her life has been difficult and she wants to pick herself up from that blow.

She wants to generate an opportunity to grow and have a business where she hopes to have many clients and create good relations with those clients. She will buy a variety of clothing with the loan for babies and toddlers up to 3 years old. She hopes that this will be the momentum she needs to make her life successful.

loans.use: to start her business selling clothing for babies, buying a variety of baby's clothing up to 3 years old.

loans.name: Anzarbek

texts.ru: Анзарбек молодой парень в возрасте 18 лет живет в сельской местности. Родители Анзарбека работают в Российской Федерации. Отец работает водителем в продуктовом магазине, мать продавщицей в том же магазине. Сам Анзарбек совмещал учебу в школе и работу кассиром в свободное время на маршрутном такси. Анзарбек мечтает получить высшее образование и стать специалистом в своей области, поэтому Анзарбек поступил в ВУЗ на факультет экономики.  Так как Анзарбек из малообеспеченной семьи то на оплату обучения у него нет финансовых возможностей. С данной проблемой он обратился в «Арванд» за поддержкой. На полученные деньги он хочет оплатить контракт и купить учебные принадлежности. Поскольку «Арванд» в данный момент дает кредит на образование Анзарбек крайне обрадовался и выразил огромную благодарность за поддержку малоимущих слоев населения в сельской местности.
texts.en: Anzarbek is an 18-year-old young man from a rural part of Tajikistan.  His parents are currently working in the Russian Federation; his father is a driver for a grocery store where his mother also works as a cashier.  While studying in secondary school, Anzarbek worked as a fare collector on a bus in his free time.  At the moment, he's enrolled at a university as an economics major, and dreams of finishing school and becoming a specialist in his field.  As he comes from modest means, he lacks the money to pay for his tuition in full, and has turned to Arvand for a loan.  The money from his loan will not only go towards his tuition, but will be used for school supplies as well.  Anzarbek is happy that he has the opportunity to get a loan for his education through Arvand, and is thankful that they're able to help people with low income from rural areas.

loans.use: pay for his university tuition

loans.name: Patricia Yamilet

texts.es: Patricia de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijas, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de  antojitos como: papas fritas, yuca frita, empanadas, tamales, etc. que vende en su casa y también de forma ambulante cerca de su lugar de residencia, gracias a las ventas que realiza ha logrado solventar los gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un préstamo  para la compra de productos que utiliza en la elaboración de sus antojitos como: aceite, papas, maíz para los tamales, plátanos y todo los ingredientes para su elaboración y así poder seguir manteniendo su hogar y poder solventar los gastos que se le pueden presentar.
texts.en: Patricia is 31 years old and lives in her own house with her life companion and her two children. She works making and selling snack foods like french fries, fried yucca, empanadas, tamales, etc.  She sells them from her house and itinerately close to her house. She is requesting a loan to buy the products that she uses in making her snack food like: oil potatoes, corn for tamales, plantains, and the other ingredients she needs to make her food. Then she can continue to support her household and be able to pay the expenses that happen.

loans.use: to buy oil, potatoes, corn for tamales, plantains and other ingredients.

loans.name: Jose Humberto

texts.es:
El señor Humberto a sus 55 años de edad trabaja y lucha día a día por mejorar sus condiciones de vida junto a su familia sueña con ver su casa terminada.
este crédito numero 11 lo solicita para la compra de Materiales de construcción ya que realizara el cascote de la casa y repello de las paredes ya que el desea en un futuro ponerle piso a su vivienda. agradece el apoyo que Kiva y Afodenic le han ofrecido estos últimos años ya que gracias a estos financiamiento ha mejorado su vida y la de su familia
texts.en:
Humberto, 55, works and strives every day to improve his family's living conditions.  He dreams of seeing his house finished.

He's requesting this loan, his eleventh, to buy construction supplies for the foundation of the house and to plaster the walls.  In the future he wants to put in a floor.

Humberto's grateful for the support he has received from Kiva and AFODENIC these past few years.  Thanks to those loans he has improved his family's life and his own.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro es un hombre de 58 años de edad, soltero, tiene un hijo de quince años y su negocio es la venta de comida típica del lugar.
Él es emprendedor, constante, trabajador, responsable, paciente y optimista. Su trabajo lo realiza en su domicilio ubicado en la zona de ‘El Torno’ lugar caracterizado por su clima tropical que bordea los 30 grados de temperatura durante todo el año y por el crecimiento constante de su población por indígenas del lugar (Ayoreos) y mineros relocalizados del occidente del país.
Pedro es de tez morena, estatura mediana, cabello gris, su lengua materna es el guaraní y habla español por su negocio. Su vida la realiza junto a su hijo que estudia en la escuela.  Su trabajo es la cocina típica del lugar, comidas como; locro de gallina (sopa de pollo), majadito de charque(arroz con carne deshidratada), pacumutu(pedazos de carne insertados en un palo asado a la parrilla), sonso de yuca (yuca y queso al horno). Estas comidas las prepara todos los días a diferentes horas según la costumbre del lugar. Su puesto de venta es en un cuarto de madera que utiliza como cocina, ordenando las mesas y sillas a un lado del camino al aire libre. Debido a la falta de una heladera las compras para su negocio las debe realizar a diario, ocasionándole pérdida de tiempo y dinero. Esta es la tercera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en trece años de experiencia en su labor. Su sueño es realizar la ampliación de su negocio realizando la compra de una congeladora para guardar los alimentos perecederos como la carne y otros insumos que utiliza a diario, de esa manera ganará tiempo para poder compartirlo con su hijo.
Es por esos motivos que Pedro solicita un préstamo para la ampliación de su negocio realizando la compra de una congeladora, y el tiempo que ganará se lo dedicará a su hijo.
texts.en:
Pedro is a 58-year-old man, single, who has a 15-year-old child. His business is the sale of traditional food from the area.

He is entrepreneurial, tenacious, hard-working, responsible, patient, and optimistic. He performs his work in his home, which is located in the ‘El Torno’ zone, a place characterized by its tropical climate, which borders a temperature of 30 degrees during the whole year, and by the constant growth of its population by natives (Ayoreans) to the area and miners relocated from the western part of the country.

Pedro is dark-skinned, of medium height, with grey hair. His mother tongue is Guaraní, and he speaks Spanish because of his business. He lives with his son, who studies in school. His work is the traditional cooking of the area, foods such as: locro de gallina (chicken soup), majadito de charque (rice with dehydrated meat), pacumutu (pieces of meat with a stick inserted through them, roasted on the grill), and yucca sonso (baked yucca and cheese). He prepares these foods every day at different hours according to the local custom.

His store is in a wooden room that he uses as a kitchen, organizing the tables and chairs at one side of the outside walkway. Owing to the lack of a freezer, the he has to make his purchases for his business every day, occasionally losing time and money. This is the third sequence of loans with the institution in thirteen years of experience with his business. His dream is to accomplish the growth of his business by purchasing a freezer to save the perishable foods such as the meat and other supplies that he uses on a daily basis. In this way, he will gain time which he will be able to share with his son.

It is because of these reasons that Pedro is requesting a loan to increase his business by purchasing a freezer, and the time he will gain he will dedicate to his son.

loans.use: to increase his business through the purchase of a freezer, and the time that he will gain, he will dedicate to his son.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es:
Jose es una persona muy responsable y emprendedor, es soltero y vive en Ica junto a su familia.
Desde hace algún tiempo viene  trabajando como encargado de almacén en una importante constructora, tiene un buen desempeño en el trabajo y esto es gracias al buen ejemplo recibido en casa desde pequeño y a los muchos valores con los que fue inculcado desde niño.
Debido a las fuertes ganas de mejorar la calidad de sus seres queridos Jose piensa utilizar el crédito para poder comprar un artefacto para su casa, él está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva por su generosidad, quiere quiere que ellos sepan que con esto su familia vivirá de manera más cómoda, así seguirá luchando por su bienestar para poder tener un futuro mejor.
texts.en:
Jose is a very responsible and hardworking person. He is single and lives in Ica with his family.

He has worked as a warehouse clerk for a large construction company for some time. He performs well at work thanks to the good example set by his parents from a young age and the many values he learned from his childhood.

Due to his urge to improve the quality of life of his loved ones, Jose plans to use the loan to buy an item for his home. 

He is very grateful to Kiva lenders for their generosity. He wants them to know that this loan will enable his family to live in greater comfort. He will continue fighting for their well-being and for a better future.

loans.use: to buy an item to make his home more comfortable.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma owns and operates a food stall. She has been successful in this business for years, and she repaid her previous loan used for the business. She also finds ways to improve her income so she can sustain her family's everyday needs.

Relative to this, she would like to take a new loan to increase her profit. She is requesting an amount of PHP 20,000 to buy products like meats, rice, vegetables, condiments, and seasonings in larger quantities. She looks forward to your generosity.

Norma hopes for her business to grow bigger and better. She dreams of giving her children a quality education. She meets up with her fellowship group* every week to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for raw ingredients like rice, pork, chicken, vegetables, and other products needed in her cooked food business.

loans.name: Ba

texts.en:
Ba is 24 years old and married with 1 child.  They lives in Hau Loc district which is a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province. 

Ba has raised poultry and cattle for 3 years and joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Ba has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a clean water syterm and hygeinic latrine. She requests a loan to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet.

Ba hopes to build a new house, have a healthy and happy family, and help  her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Mark Christian

texts.en: Mark Christian is taking up Automotive Servicing in St. Paul Colleges Foundation. His mother is a housekeeper while his father is a farmer. Sometimes what his parents earn is not enough for him and his three siblings. That’s why he wants to finish his studies to help his parents and siblings out of poverty. He knows that KIVA lenders can help him by approving his 10,000 PHP education loan which he will use to pay for his schooling.

loans.use: to pay for his tuition fee

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en:
Miriam has faithfully paid back her previous loan which she used for her business. She has been operating her own “sari-sari” (variety) store for years and she makes good income from this. Having a bigger family requires more effort to provide for their needs, especially for her five children. She has to work hard, with the determination of having better income, to provide their children with better education. 

To improve sales, Miriam would like to apply for a new loan to purchase additional grocery goods to sell. With PHP 10,000, she could purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business. She sincerely lets you know her heartfelt thanks and appreciation for this assistance in advance.

Miriam hopes to get new customers and she has always wanted good health for her family. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items and other products needed in her business.

loans.name: Abra  Massa

texts.fr: Massa est commerçante de pagne ; elle a 33 ans, célibataire et  analphabète. Massa est située à Adidogomé et exerce cet activité depuis 2009, aussi s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au grand de Lomé.Elle est en location et à un niveau d’étude primaire,puis n’en dispose pas de moyen de déplacement. Massa  sollicite ce prêt dans le but de satisfaire sa clientèle et  pour l’avancement de son commerce. Abra désire avoir une vie radieuse par l’économie de  son revenu.
texts.en: Abra Massa sells pagnes (traditional wrap around). She is 33 years old, single, and illiterate. Abra Massa lives in Adidogomé and has been in this business since 2009. She stocks up twice a month at the grand market in Lomé. She rents and has an elementary reading level, and is not in a position to move. Massa is seeking this loan in the goal of satisfying her clientele and advancing her business. Abra Massa wants to have a brilliant life from her business earnings.

loans.use: to buy 4 pagnes

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en:
Corazon is married and works hard to support her family. She has had a vegtable vending business for 2 years.

She requests 6,500 PHP through NWTF to buy additional vegetable to sell.

In the future, Corazon would like to save money to buy more farm land.

loans.use: to buy vegetable to sell.

loans.name: Rania

texts.en:
Rania is a hardworking 38-year-old married woman who lives in Wihdat, Jordan with her five family members.

She has been working in making and selling men's head scarves for three years. She is planning to open her own workshop to expand her business and income.

Now Rania is applying for this loan to purchase more raw materials for making head scarves, that will raise her productivity.

loans.use: to buy more raw materials for making men's head scarves

loans.name: Ludmila

texts.ru:
Людмила занимается тепличным хозяйством. Предыдущий кредит помог ей удачно провести сезон и получить хорошую прибыль.

В семье Людмилы все налаживается. Они с мужем делают ремонт в доме: провели отопление и горячую воду, отремонтировали ванную комнату. Также муж забетонировал двор. 

Людмила не планировала брать кредит в этом году. Она рассчитывала на второй урожай огурца, но была сильная буря и ветром сорвало пленку с теплицы. Из-за этого пропал весь урожай. 

Людмила просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 15 000 гривен на закупку семян и пленки. Кредит поможет ей отремонтировать теплицы и приобрести качественные семена помидора.
texts.en:
Ludmila is a greenhouse grower. Her previous loan helped her to have a successful season and earn a good income. 

Everything is getting better for Ludmila's family. She and her husband are making some repairs on the house, installing heating and hot water and renovating the bathroom. Her husband also  put down concrete in the yard. 

Ludmila did not plan to take out a loan this year. She was expecting a second cucumber crop, but a heavy storm and winds tore the sheeting off the greenhouse. Because of this, she lost her whole crop. 

Ludmila is asking for a loan of 15,000 hryvnia to buy seeds and sheeting. The loan will help her repair her greenhouse and buy quality tomato seeds.

loans.use: to buy seeds and plastic greenhouse sheeting

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es: Sandra de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus cuatro hijos, ella tiene una tienda en su casa de habitación y con lo que gana logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, ella quiere mejorar sui vivienda construyendo el cuarto del baño donde muestra la fotografía ya que esta hecho de plástico y tela, pero con lo que gana no le alcanza para poder realizarlo, por eso solicita un crédito para comprar ladrillos, cemento, arena, hierro y pago de mano de obra para poder tener mas limpia y ordenada su casa.
texts.en:
Sandra, 33 years old, lives in her own house with her life partner and four children. She has a store in her house and manages to settle the household expenses with what she earns. 

She wants to improve her home, building a bathroom where the photo shows because it is currently made of plastic and cloth. However, she is not able to afford to do this with her earnings. She is requesting a loan to buy bricks, cement, sand, metal and labor so she can have a well-ordered and cleaner home.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, metal and labor.

loans.name: Norma  Llanira

texts.es: Norma tiene 37 años de edad y se dedica a la crianza de ganado de engorde desde hace 10 años, los vende en los alrededores de la zona y ya tiene muchos clientes fijos, con las ganancias que obtiene logra salir adelante con los gastos que se le presentan,  Norma vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos, ella solicita un crédito para la comprar de concentrado y ganado para seguir con la crianza y asi poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Norma is 37 years old and has made a living rearing fattening cattle for 10 years. She sells them around her community and already has a lot of regular customers. With the earnings she makes she manages to move forwards and pay any costs which arise. Norma lives in her own home with her husband and three children. She is requesting a loan to buy feed and cattle to continue rearing them and, in this way, boost her income.

loans.use: to buy cattle and feed.

loans.name: Del Mar Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “DEL  MAR” iniciará el décimo noveno ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por doce  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Martha es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tejido de chompas, venta de CD’s, venta de leche, venta de ropa, tejido y venta de mantas, venta de frutas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Martha es integrante, ella indica que hace seis años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de elaboración de ropa folklorica; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió hace trece años, al casarse, ya que la familia de su esposo es bordadora y ellos asumieron este negocio independientemente.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de su mercadería (compra de tela, lentejuela y perlas por mayor) que lo adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas, posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene cinco hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud  y las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución.

En la imagen esta ausente una de las clientes, la mis se encontraba en el consultorio médico por esa razón no estuvo presente, sin embargo acompaña al grupo su esposo mismo que esta vestido con una chompa café clara.
texts.en:
The communal banking group "Del Mar" or "Of the Sea" will begin its 19th loan cycle with Pro Mujer.  The group forms part of the downtown region of Collpani, and the group is made up of 12 members and is directed by a board with Martha as President.  The businesses run by this communal bank are varied, including the following: Knitting sweaters, selling CDs, selling milk, selling clothing, knitting and sewing blankets, and selling fruit. 

The loan will be used to benefit micro-entreprenuers in the communal banking group to which Martha belongs.  She indicates that she joined Pro Mujer six years ago, and that she joined based on the invitation of a friend who is a member. Currently she has a business making traditional clothing. She learned her field 13 years ago, upon marrying, since the family of her husband has long worked with needle point and they started an independent business.  

The loan that she is requesting will be used to increase her merchandise (via the purchase of fabric, sequins, and pearls in bulk). These will be purchased from sellers in bulk and then used to make items which are subsequently sold in her place of business.  This form of work allows her to generate income to support her family, since she is married and has 5 children. 

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the health care area and the trainings provided by the institution.  

In the picture one group member is missing because she had a doctor's appointment and for that reason was not able to be in the picture.  However, her husband came to the meeting to accompany the group, and he is dressed in a light brown or beige sweater.

loans.use: To purchase fabric, sequins and pearls in bulk for use in sewing.

loans.name: Rayito De Arcoiris Group

texts.es: El grupo Rayito de Arcoíris está conformado por tres socias micro empresarias  de éxito uno de ellas es Deyling de 22 años, soltera, desde hace 1 años se dedica a vender ropa, cosméticos  y tiene un puesto de fritanga de manera ambulante en la capital, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de perfumes, vanidades, sombras, etc; compras de variedades de ropa y granos básicos, etc. La segunda socia es Zurama tiene 32 años su negocio es venta de frijoles cocidos, tortillas y nacatamales y la socia Argentina tiene 29 años de edad su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva.
texts.en:
Rayito de Arcoiris Group is made up of three successful micro-entrepreneurs.

One of the members, Deyling, is 22 years old and single.  She has earned a living for 1 years selling clothing and cosmetics, and she sells fried food as a street vendor in the capital.

She's going to invest the loan in buying perfume, makeup, eye shadow, and a variety of clothing and basic grains.

The second member is Zurama, 32; her business is selling cooked beans, tortillas, and nacatamales. Finally, Argentina is the third member,29; her business is selling new clothing.

loans.use: to buy perfume, makeup, eye shadow, clothing, basic grains, etc.

loans.name: Cường

texts.en:
Cường has had a retail business selling dry food for 5 years. 

He is 35 years old and has 2 children.  He lives with 2 dependents in Hau Loc district which is a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Cường's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.  One of the most critical needs that concerns him is not having a clean water syterm and hygeinic latrine. He requests a loan to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet.

Cường hopes for his business to do well,  his family to be healthy and happy, and  his children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Viện

texts.en:
Mr. Viện works in agriculture, farming food. Viện is 35 years old and he is married with 3 children. Viện supports 3 dependents with his business in the Quang Xuong district, a rural town in the Thanh Hoa province.

This is Viện first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Viện has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Viện faces in his life is not having a latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick in order to build a toilet .

In the future, Viện hopes for his family to be healthy and happy, to make enough money to provide for his kids, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick, in order to build a toilet

loans.name: Liên

texts.en:
Mrs. Liên works in agriculture, farming food. Liên is 36 years old and she is married with three children. Liên lives with three dependents in the Quang Xuong district, a rural town in the Thanh Hoa province.

This is Liên's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Liên has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Liên faces in her life is not having a latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick in order to build a toilet.

In the future, Liên hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick in order to build a toilet

loans.name: Nhân

texts.en:
Nhân is 27 years old, and he is married with 2 children. Nhân lives with 2 dependents in a rural town in Quang Xuong district, in Thanh Hoa province.

Nhân has a service business repairing electronics. He has been involved in this business for 6 years.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns him is not having a hygienic latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick…to build a toilet. This is Nhân first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With his business profit, Nhân hopes for his family to be healthy and happy, for his business to do well, and to make enough money to provide for his kids.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick…to build a toilet

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is very grateful for the 50,000 PHP loan assistance that was granted to her. Her previous loan was a big help for her business, as she was able to purchase products for her direct selling business. The loan is also useful in the education of her child. Her income from the loan assisted with their everyday expenditures at home. She and her husband are working hard to provide for their everyday needs.

She would like to apply for another 50,000 PHP loan. It will be used to buy additional supplies and merchandise, such as clothing, footwear, undergarments, and cosmetics. The more items she has on display and available on hand, the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from this business will definitely help her to sustain her child’s education and daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Gemma hopes that her business will continue to become successful and she dreams of going to another country someday. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week, where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15-30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional supplies and merchandise products like clothing, footwear, undergarments, and cosmetics needed in her business

loans.name: Akofa

texts.fr: Akofa 32 ans, née à lomé est revendeuse de sac et de bâche pour mais  depuis 2010 ;situé  Adidogomé . Elle a un niveau premier, mariée mère d’un enfantAkofa approvisionne au grand marché deux fois par mois ; elle sollicite ce prêt pour augmenter la taille de son commerce. Akofa  pense à l’éducation supérieure et à l’épanouissement de son enfant par l’épargne de son revenu.
texts.en: Akofa, 32, was born in Lomé, and has been selling corn sacks since 2010. She lives in Adidogomé, has an elementary reading level, and is a married mother of one. Afoka stocks up at the grand market twice a month. She is seeking this loan to grow her business. Akofa is thinking about higher education and the flourishing of her child by saving her profits.

loans.use: to buy four corn sacks

loans.name: Yaovi

texts.fr: Yaovi est née à Agoin/Lacs, âgé de 40 ans est  vendeuse de chaussures depuis 2006. Elle est mariée et mère deux  enfants. yaovi réside à Adidogomé. Elle a un niveau eu son BAC. Yaovi  sollicite  ce prêt pour augmenté  son commerce  puis éviter  approvisionnement deux fois par mois au grand marché.Madame Yaovi prétend leur épanouissement de sa vie et ses enfants  par l’épargne de ses revenus
texts.en: Yaovi was born in Agoin/Lacs, is 40 years old, and has been selling shoes since 2006. She is a married mother of two. Yaovi lives in Adidogomé. She is a high school graduate. Yaovi  is seeking this loan to grow her business and to avoid the need to stock up twice a month at the grand market. Mrs. Yaovi claims that her life with her children is flourishing from the savings from her profits.

loans.use: to buy 3 packages of shoes

loans.name: Sadaf

texts.ru: Садаф 30 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают четырех летнего сына. У Садаф среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав в 2004 году благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Садаф, на сегодняшний день у нее есть: 1 корова, 15 овец и  земельный надел мерою 0,30 ГА, где она выращивает картофель и кукурузу. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). Садаф обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) для закупки 8 овец. Садаф намерена свои доходы от кредита направлять на развитие бизнеса.
texts.en: Sadaf is 30, married, and raising a 4-year-old son together with her husband.  She has the equivalent of a high school education, and is a crop and livestock farmer by trade.  She first started in 2004, and currently has a cow and fifteen sheep on her farm as well as 0.30 hectares of land for growing potatoes and corn, while her monthly income is nearly 10,000 som.  She owes all of this to her persistence, her goal-oriented nature, and her love of hard work.  Sadaf is seeking a loan of 50,000 som from Bai Tushum Bank to buy eight sheep, and intends to use her extra income due to the loan to further grow her business.

loans.use: buy eight sheep to grow her business

loans.name: Marcos

texts.es: Marcos de 64 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y su hijo, el se dedica desde hace 40 años a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz, pipián, yuca, ayote, cuando ya esta su cosecha la comercializa en los pueblos aledaños, ya tiene muchos clientes fijos, también se dedica a la crianza de pollos, Marcos está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, insecticidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con sus cultivos ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Marcos is 64 years old; he lives in his own house with his life partner and son. For 40 years he has been growing corn, squash, cassava, and pumpkins. When his harvest is ready he sells it in the neighboring towns.  He already has many regular customers.  He also raises chickens. 

Marcos is requesting this loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, pesticides, herbicides, insecticides, etc., and improve the land that is shown in the picture to be able to continue with his crops since it his only means of work and thus have better earnings.

loans.use: buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, pesticides, herbicides, insecticides, etc., and improve the land

loans.name: Marina Concepcion

texts.es: Marina de 55 años de edad posee un comedor y venta de pupusas ubicado frente a la unidad de salud en una zona muy transitada desde hace 12 años, empezó vendiendo gaseosas, jugos, refrescos y agua y últimamente le ha ido muy bien en su negocio por esa razón posee mucho clientes, vive en casa propia con su esposo quien trabaja como albañil, Marina está solicitando nuevamente un crédito pero esta vez es para la compra de materia prima como maíz, quesillo, carne, pollo, verduras, refrescos, frutas, etc. para continuar con su trabajo y así poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Marina, 55, has had a restaurant and pupusa business located across from the health department in a very busy area for 12 years.  She started selling soda, juice, soft drinks, and water.  Lately it has been going very well for her in her business, so she has a lot of customers.  She lives in her own house with her husband, who works in construction.

Marina's requesting another loan, but this time to buy corn, quesillo [a soft cheese], meat, chicken, vegetables, soft drinks, fruit, and other ingredients to keep on working and earn more income.

loans.use: to buy corn, cheese, meat, chicken, vegetables, soft drinks, fruit, etc.

loans.name: Miriam Elizabeth

texts.es: Miriam tiene 50 años de edad y desde hace 6 años se dedica a la confección de ropa, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia y posee muchos clientes, con las ganancias que obtiene de su trabajo logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, Miriam vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de variedad de telas, botones, agujas, hilos, adornos, elásticos, etc. todo por mayor para continuar con su trabajo y generar mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Miriam is 50 years old and lives in her own home with her family. 

She has been making a living making clothes for six years now. Her business is located in her house, and she has many customers. With the profits that she generates from her work, she manages to cover some of her household expenses.

She is requesting a loan to buy a variety of fabrics, buttons, needles, thread, decorations, elastics, and the like wholesale to be able to continue with her work and generate better profits.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of fabrics, buttons, needles, thread, decorations, elastics, and the like wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies

loans.name: Lâm

texts.en:
Mr. Lâm works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. He is 38 years old and married, with no children. Lâm lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. He has been involved in the agriculture business for more than 10 years.

This is Lâm first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. The main harship that Lâm faces in life is not having a latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick, to build a toilet.

Lâm hopes for his family to be healthy and happy, for his business to do well, and to build a new house, in the future.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick, with which to build a toilet

loans.name: Nga

texts.en:
Mrs. Nga operates a food stall, selling meat. She has been involved in this business for five years. Nga is 33 years old, and she is married and has two children. She lives with her two dependents in Hoang Hoa district, a rural place in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Nga's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. The main hardship that Nga faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick, with which to build a toilet.

In the future, Nga hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick, with which to build a toilet.

loans.name: Louie

texts.en: Louie is 43 years old; he lives with his wife and two school-aged children in Tudela, Philippines. Louie is a minimum wage earner employee. He applied for a loan from PMPC amounting to 30,000 PHP to purchase additional materials for the completion of his house. He became a full-fledged member of PMPC this 2014. Louie wishes nothing more than to provide his family with a decent and comfortable living situation.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials for the completion of his house

loans.name: Rosa Victoria

texts.es: Rosa es una madre de familia abnegada, siempre preocupándose por el bienestar de los suyos, tiene dos maravillosos hijos quienes son el principal motor de su vida, por quienes lucha día a día para poder brindarles lo mejor. Desde hace varios años se dedica a alquilar un automóvil que con mucho esfuerzo pudo adquirir, ella cree que le está yendo bien porque siempre se esfuerza en todo lo que hace y cada día trata de ser un buen ejemplo para sus hijos. Rosa quiere utilizar este crédito para poder cubrir algunos gastos de un viaje que su hijo tendrá en el colegio. Ella está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva por su generosidad, quiere que ellos sepan que con esto ella podrá cumplir el sueño de su hijo que es este viaje y así se sentirá feliz por él. Más adelante espera que sus hijos puedan convertirse en grandes profesionales y así vivirá tranquila.
texts.en:
Rosa is a selfless mother, always worrying about her children's well-being. She has two wonderful children who are the main driver in her life, and for whom she fights every day to give them the best. 

She has made a living for several years by hiring out a car, which she was able to purchase with a great deal of effort. She thinks things are going well because she always works hard in everything she does and tries to set good example to her children every day.

Rosa wants to use this loan to pay for the the costs of a school trip her child will take. She is very grateful to Kiva lenders for their generosity, and wants them to know that the loan will allow her son to achieve his dream of going on the trip, and she will feel very happy for him. In the future, she hopes that her children become successful professionals, and allow her to live peacefully.

loans.use: to pay for her child's school trip.

loans.name: Milka

texts.en:
Milka is a 28-year-old woman who is married to Yanir, a 34-year-old man. They are blessed with five children in their marriage namely Rianti, 9 years old, a fourth grade student of Elementary School; Rio, 7 years old, a second grade student of Elementary School; Jimmy, 5 years old, a Kindergarten student; Anjal, 3; and Sofia, a newborn baby. 

Milka is a housewife while her husband, Yanir, is a truck driver. In addition to taking care of her family, she also spends her time breeding pigs. She initiated this business in 2007 with her own capital of 1,000,000 IDR to buy two piglets. 

Currently, she wants to expand her business by purchasing three more piglets. She also plans to build a small kiosk in front of her house so that she may have two kinds of businesses. Therefore, she applies for an individual loan amounting to 3,000,000 IDR from TLM. The loan will be used to purchase three piglets and materials for a small kiosk building.

loans.use: to purchase three piglets and materials for a small kiosk building

loans.name: Liberty

texts.en: Liberty is 47 years old and married. She lives in Sibutad, Zamboanga del Norte, Philippines. For the past two years, Liberty has been farming, earning 1,500 PHP each month. She is a new member of PMPC. Liberty is requesting a 10,000 PHP loan to purchase fertilizer. In the future, she hopes to expand and improve her business and her banana plants.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Olivia

texts.en:
Olivia, 49, is a resident of GMA, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Ronaldo, a taxi driver, and has four children, two of whom are in high school, one in elementary school and one already working. Olivia manages her household while operating the business. She works hard to augment the family's income to support and meet their daily personal and household needs and to send her children to school. 

Olivia has operated a variety store for five years. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store which sells fresh, dry and packaged commodities directly to consumers. Almost all products are essential household items and food. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, PHP 5-worth of cooking oil or an egg. Olivia earns by buying supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. She also sells frozen processed foods. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. Olivia earns a minimum net income of PHP 800 a day. 

To help her continue operations of her business, Olivia is requesting a PHP 15,000 loan to buy grocery items such as fresh meat, sacks of rice, charcoal, soda and other grocery items. She is positive that her income will increase as she expands her business. Olivia thanks God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given her.

Olivia hopes to maintain and grow her business so her family can have a better life. She strives hard to give her children the best education possible and prays for a quiet and happy life. Olivia faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members weekly to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, beverages and toiletries to sell at her store.

loans.name: Nonita

texts.en:
Nonita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing/fish-vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 12,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional materials and gears for her fishing/fish-vending business.

Nonita has been in this business for four years. Nonita earns additional income from farming vegetables and raising pigs.

Nonita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials and gears for her fishing business

loans.name: Remegia

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Remegia works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Remegia is borrowing 28,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy fishing nets and other equipment for her fishing business.

Remegia has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream- to save money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and other equipment

loans.name: Isabel

texts.en:
A loan of USD 800 is offered to Isabel to improve her business. 

She has a kiosk where many people come to buy every day, but her kiosk is very small, so she will use the loan to buy additional supplies to keep in her kiosk, such as biscuits, medicine, toothpaste, perfume, soft drinks, and other things to sell. 

She has been involving herself in business activities since 2006, with her own working capital of USD 300. She feels so comfortable running her business because she can earn money every day. 

She hopes to run her business in a bigger manner in the future.

loans.use: to buy biscuits, medicine, toothpaste, perfume, soft drinks, and other things to sell.

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
Zenaida is 45 years old and married with three children, two of whom are in school.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Zenaida is borrowing 25,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Zenaida has been raising pigs for 20 years and also earns additional income from a general store and from farming corn.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
El señor Fernando es un hombre muy emprendedor y creativo, desde hace mucho tiempo ha querido ser independiente y tener su propio negocio de Café y Bar.

Actualmente puede materializar su sueño gracias su gran capacidad de trabajo y al apoyo que puede recibir de las personas que deseen que él salga adelante.

De este negocio dependerán su esposa y 3 de sus hijos a los cuales desea enseñarles del negocio y dejarles un legado.

Solicita un apoyo económico para comprar sillas, mesas, enfriador y surtido de licores en gran variedad, de esta forma podrá cumplir su sueño de ser independiente.

Con un préstamo podrás a poyar a un veterano lleno de vida y empuje para su familia.
texts.en:
Fernando is a creative and entrepreneurial man. For a long time he's wanted to be independent and have his own café and bar business. Now he is able to make his dream materialize thanks to his work capacity and the support he is able to receive from people who wish to see him succeed. His wife and three of their children will depend on this business. He wishes to teach them the business and pass it on to them.

He is requesting financial support to buy chairs, tables, a cooler and a large variety of liquors. In this way he will be able to realize his dream of becoming independent. With a loan you will be supporting a veteran who is full of life and the driving force for his family.

loans.use: to buy chairs, tables, a cooler and a large variety of liquors.

loans.name: Rugenge Group

texts.fr:
Israël fait partie du groupe  Rugenge et  habite à  Bujumbura. Il a 44 ans et est mariée à Jeanine. Ensemble ils ont 6 enfants âgés de 3 à 17 ans, dont  5 étudient.
Il a sous sa charge 1 enfant  membre de sa famille élargie.

Il fait le commerce de boutique (haricot, sel, riz, …) depuis 2 ans.  

Elle est son à deuxième   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de riz, de haricot, et de sel à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait  voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Israël is a member of the Rugenge group and lives in Bujumbura. He is 44 years old and married to Jeanine. Together they have 6 children between the ages of 3 and 17, 5 of whom attend school. Israël also supports one child from his extended family.

Israël has had a shop selling beans, salt, rice, etc. for 2 years. He is on his second loan with Turame. 

With the Kiva loan that he obtains, Israël will increase his business capital and purchase a large quantity of rice, beans, and salt to resell and increase his earnings. In the coming years, he hopes to be able to provide for his children's education.

loans.use: to increase his business capital and purchase a large quantity of rice, beans, and salt to resell and increase his earnings

loans.name: Gatimakeza Group

texts.fr:
Siméon fait partie du groupe  Gatimakeza et  habite à  Bujumbura. Il a 35 ans et est mariée à Aline, une commerçante. Ensemble ils ont 3 enfants âgés de 2 à 7 ans, dont  2 étudient.
Il a sous sa charge  un orphelin qui étudie. 

Il fait le commerce des habits depuis  5 ans. 

Il est à son deuxième  crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu'il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup d’habits, à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années  il voudrait  voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Siméon is a member of the Gatimakeza group and lives in Bujumbura. He is 35 years old and married to Aline, a shopkeeper.

Together they have 3 children between the ages of 2 and 7, two of whom attend school. Siméon also supports an orphan who attends school.

Siméon has been selling clothing for 5 years. He is on his second loan with Turame. With the Kiva loan that he obtains, Siméon will increase his business capital and purchase many articles of clothing, to resell and increase his earnings.

In the coming years, Siméon would like to see his children educated.

loans.use: to increase his business capital and purchase many articles of clothing to resell and increase his earnings

loans.name: Abra

texts.fr: Abra est revendeuse d’alimentation et de bouillie ; elle a 50 ans et veuve  avec un niveau primaire. Abra est située à Adidogome .Abra sollicite ce prêt pour s’approvisionner  une fois par mois à assiyeyé, de sac de mais ; de paniers de gombo et piments pour l’avancement de son commerce.Abra désire avoir une vie radieuse par l’économie de  son revenu
texts.en:
Abra is a reseller of foods and broth; she is 50 years old, a widow, and has a primary level of education.

Abra is located in Adidogome. She is requesting this loan to be able to procure supplies once per month in Assiyeyé, namely bags of corn, baskets of okra, and spices to be able to grow her business.

Abra hopes to have a wonderful life thanks to the success of her business.

loans.use: to purchase 2 bags of corn, 9 baskets of okra, 10 bowls of dried spices, and 1 bag of sugar

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.fr:
Akossiwa a 30 ans, née à Kouma Adame est revendeuse de charbon de bois à domicile depuis 2011 ; situé  Adidogomé. Elle a un niveau primaire, mariée mère de deux enfants Akossiwa s’approvisionne à Kpalime quatre fois par mois ; elle sollicite ce prêt pour augmenter la taille de son commerce et réduire les charges de transport. 
Akossiwa pense à l’éducation supérieure ; à son épanouissement et celui de ses enfants par l’épargne de son revenu.
texts.en: Akossiwa is 30 years old, was born in Kouma Adame, and has been selling charcoal from her home in Adidogomé since 2011. She had an elementary school education, is a married mother of two, and stocks up at Kpalime four times a month. She is seeking this loan to grow her business and reduce the costs of transport. Akossiwa thinks about higher education and about her family flourishing by saving her profits.

loans.use: to buy 8 sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Hugo Antonio

texts.es: Hugo de 35 años de edad vive con su esposa y sus dos hijas en casa propia, el es un hombre trabajador y responsable, desde hace 20 años se dedica a la  crianza de ganado lechero (producción y venta de leche) en la zona donde reside y también al cultivo de maíz y frijol. Tiene muy buena clientela ya que ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus clientes, ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus productos, ha decidido invertir en el cuidado de sus ganados ya que de eso depende su negocio. Por eso ha solicitado un crédito para poder comprar vitaminas para el ganado y ajustar para la compra de otra vaca lechera ya que le ha ido muy bien con el negocio y asi seguir teniendo mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Hugo is 35 and lives in his own house with his wife and their two daughters. He is a hard-working and responsible man. He has worked for 20 years raising milk cows, producing and selling milk in the area where he lives. He also grows maize and beans. He has a good clientele as he knows how to gain his customers' confidence. He offers quality and good prices in his produce. He has decided to invest in caring for his livestock as his business depends on this.

He is asking for a loan to buy vitamins for his livestock and to purchase another milk cow. This is because his business has been going well, and this is how he can continue to earn a good income.

loans.use: to buy vitamins for his livestock and another milk cow.

loans.name: Lực

texts.en:
Lực works in agriculture farming poultry and cattle.

Lực is 60 years old and he is married with 2 children. He lives and works in Quang Xuong district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Lực's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Lực has been involved his business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns him is not having a latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

With his business profit, Lực hopes for his family to be healthy and happy, for his business to do well, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Siempre Juntos Group

texts.es: Un grupo conformado por 5  personas emprendedores  y con mucha creatividad para los negocios. Así son los integrantes del grupo comunal “SIEMPRE JUNTOS”.  La Sra. Sara de 50 años de edad soltera   y madre de 1  hijo,  ella se dedica hace 10 años  a la venta de comida tanto en el día como en la noche,  La Sra. Sara  nos cuenta que ha llegado a fidelizar  a sus clientes   el cual le ha generado ganancias para poder cubrir los gastos de su hogar,  En el futuro le gustaría tener un local propio donde poder vender su comida y obtener mayores ganancias económicas. Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá   en  ampliar su local y comprar mas (menestras,arroz,aceite etc ) así poder salir adelante. A la vez  la Sra. Sara    y todos los integrantes se encuentran  agradecidos   con Kiva,  A la sra. Sara se le distingue  por  su casaca de color fucsia, Dejando la promesa  que cumplirá todas sus metas propuestas
texts.en:
This group is comprised of five entrepreneurs who are very creative when it comes to doing business. That is how the members of the communal bank “Siempre Juntos” [Together Forever] are.

Sara is 50 years old and single. She has a son and has been selling food for ten years, day and night. Sara says that she has a fixed customer base, which has helped her to receive an income to cover the home expenses. In the future, she would like to have her own establishment where she can sell her food and make more profits.

With this loan, she will enlarge her establishment and buy more ingredients (vegetables, rice, vegetable oil, etc.) in order to get ahead. Sara and the other members want to thank Kiva. Sara is wearing a purple sweater. She promises to achieve all her goals.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, rice, oil, etc.

loans.name: Margarito

texts.es: Margarito de 55 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo quien le ayuda en las siembras, el se dedica desde hace 30 años a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz, cuando ya está su cosecha la comercializa en los pueblos aledaños, ya tiene muchos clientes fijos, Margarito está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con sus cultivos ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Margarito is 55 years old and lives in his own house with his son who helps with the planting. Margarito has spent more than 30 in agriculture, cultivating corn. At harvest time, he sells his production in neighboring villages. He has many fixed customers.

Margarito is requesting a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, manure, plague controls, herbicides, etc. He also wishes to improve the terrain displayed in the picture in order to continue its cultivation, since this is his only source of work and, thus, to improve his income.

loans.use: buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, plague controls, herbicides, etc., and to improve the soil.

loans.name: Yên

texts.en:
Yên is 56 years old, and she is married with three children. Yên lives in a rural town in Hoang Hoa district, in Thanh Hoa province.

Yên has a retail business selling lagim. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. In 2006, Yên joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Yên has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Yên faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick…to build a toilet.

In the future, Yên hopes to maintain a successful business, to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick…to build a toilet

loans.name: Rafael Antonio

texts.es: Rafael de 45 años de edad viven casa propia con su compañera de vida y su hija, el se dedica a realizar viajes en su taxi desde hace 22 años, tiene muchos clientes que lo prefieren por la responsabilidad que tiene a la hora de manejar, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de llantas y darle mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y poder tener mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Rafael, 45 years old, lives in his own house with his life partner and his daughter. He has worked making trips in his taxi for 22 years. He has many customers that prefer him for his responsible driving. With what he makes from his work he manages to settle household expenses that come up. He is requesting a loan to buy tires and perform maintenance on his vehicle because it is his only source of employment and in order to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy tires and perform maintenance on his vehicle.

loans.name: Ghi

texts.en:
Mrs. Ghi works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. Ghi has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. She is 55 years old, and she is married and has three children. Ghi lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013 Ghi joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women, to improve her business. Ghi has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick, to build a toilet.

Ghi hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to maintain a successful and profitable business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick, to build a toilet.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en: Gina operates a motor transport business. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 250 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every day. For her to continue her business, she availed herself of a loan to pay for motor spare parts and repair so she can provide continuous operation. Her dreams are to own motor units and be able to provide sufficiently for the family.

loans.use: to pay for motor spare parts and repair to allow for continuous operation.

loans.name: Elber Carlos

texts.es:
Elber es un joven muy trabajador, soltero y con muchas ganas de salir adelante y brindarle lo mejor a su familia, estudió la carrera de Administración y actualmente está trabajando en una empresa que brinda servicios de Turismo. Él cada mañana se levanta muy motivado, porque siempre da lo mejor de si mismo para poder obtener los mejores resultados en su labor.
Elber piensa utilizar el crédito para poder comprarse una impresora, de esta manera podrá imprimir algunos archivos que necesita para poder aprender más, él está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva por su generosidad, con esto espera sobresalir y poder tener un mejor puesto de trabajo para seguir mejorando de calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Elber is a hardworking, young man. He is single and has a lot of motivation to get ahead and provide the best for his family. He studied Administration and now works in a company that provides tourism services. Each morning he wakes up very motivated because he always wants to do the best for himself so that he can have the best results at work. 

Elber is thinking about using this loan to buy a printer. This way he can print some documents that he needs to learn more. 

He is very grateful to the Kiva lenders for their generosity. With this, he hopes to get ahead and be able to have a better position at work to continue improving the quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy a printer for his work.

loans.name: Thanh

texts.en:
Mrs. Thanh, 24 years old, has operated a food stall for two years, selling fish. She is married and has one child. Thanh lives in Quang Xuong district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Thanh's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a latrine . She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet. 

With her business profit, Thanh hopes for her family to be healthy and happy and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a latrine.

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora is a widow with three adult aged children. She lives in Tudela, Philippines. Leonora earns a living from her monthly retirement pension, which supports her daily needs. Leonora applied for her membership in PMPC in 2010. She hopes to maintain her membership in good standing with a good repayment record. 

Leonora wants to obtain financial assistance to purchase materials for the completion of her house. Leonora is very thankful that all her financing needs were supported by PMPC. She just wishes to live a simple but happy and comfortable life.

loans.use: to purchase materials for the completion of her house

loans.name: Danni Rose

texts.en:
Danni Rose is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Danni Rose is 24 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Danni Rose has a ice cream vending business in the Philippines. Danni Rose requested a 10,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients and materials for her ice cream vending business.

Danni Rose has been in this business for 6 years. In the future, Danni Rose would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and materials for her ice cream vending business

loans.name: Tessie

texts.en:
Tessie is 42 years old and married, and she has seven children. She earns a living by working in her pig fattening business, in the Philippines. She has been in pig fattening for six years, and she earns additional income from farming sugarcane.

Tessie is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF. She will use the loan to purchase feed, vitamins, and other supplies for her pigs.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream, to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feed, vitamins, and other supplies for her pigs.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer humilde y trabajadora que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos, vive en el municipio de Puerto Salgar desde donde se desempeña espectacularmente en la cocina ya que su negocio es la preparación de comidas como almuerzos y desayunos, adicionalmente vende mercancía variada como cosméticos y accesorios de vestir.

Estos alimentos y mercancía los vende principalmente a vecinos del sector quienes conocen la sazón de Maria y saben que siempre obtendrán alimentos deliciosos y muy bien preparados además de buenos precios por sus productos.

Maria desea aumentar su venta de alimentos y desea trabajar de una manera más cómoda, por esta razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos para continuar realizando sus recetas, adicionalmente comprara una vitrina y surtido de mercancía para vender.

Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante sus negocios para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is a humble, hard-working woman who dedicates a big part of her life to taking care of her children. She lives in the Municipality of Puerto Salgar, where she is a spectacular chef in the kitchen of her business, which entails preparing meals, like breakfast and lunch; she also sells other merchandise, like cosmetics and clothing accessories.

She sells her meals and merchandise mainly to her neighbors in the area, who know Maria's seasoning and know they'll always get delicious, well-prepared meals, as well as good prices.

Maria wants to increase food sales and wishes to work in a more comfortable manner, and that's why she is requesting a loan to buy ingredients so she can continue preparing her recipes, and to buy a showcase and a variety of merchandise to sell.

This loan will permit Maria to move forward with her business, so she can generate the income she needs to continue to take care of her family.

loans.use: buy ingredients to continue preparing her recipes and also buy a showcase and other merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma, 44 years old, is married and has four children, three of them in school. Emma works very hard to provide for her family.

For the past ten years, Emma has run a general store in the Philippines, selling a variety of items such as sopa, rice, canned goods and other groceries. She has requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell. In the future, Emma would like to save enough money to continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Maria Ines

texts.es: Maria de 60 años de edad se dedica desde hace 12 años a la venta de golosinas (galletas, dulces, gelatinas, etc.) su negocio lo tiene en el mercado municipal y posee muchos clientes fijos, ella vive con su grupo familiar en casa propia, Doña Maria solicita nuevamente un crédito para la compra de mas golosinas por mayor para aumentar la mercadería ya que la ha ido bien en sus ventas y asi tener mas clientes y mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
María, 60, has been selling sweets (cookies, candies, gelatin desserts, etc.) for twelve years. She has a stall at the municipal marketplace and many fixed customers. She lives with her family in a house of her own.

María is requesting a loan again to buy more sweets in bulk in order to increase her stock levels. Her sales are good and she will now have more customers and a higher income.

loans.use: to buy sweets in bulk, such as cookies, sweets and gelatin desserts.

loans.name: Nelson

texts.es: Nelson de 44 años de edad tiene un negocio de venta de tortas y hamburguesas desde hace 2 años tiene muy buena clientela pues vende su comida a un buen precio vende de forma ambulante en su carretón por los diferentes mercados, con las ganancias que obtiene cubre algunos gastos de su hogar, Nelson solicita un crédito que le permita poder comprar todo lo necesario para elaborar sus tortas y hamburguesas como: pan, tomates, cebollas, mayonesa, mortadelas, entre otros ingredientes y reparar el carretón que muestra en la fotografía y poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando en su casa con los gastos que se le puedan presentar.
texts.en:
Nelson, 44 years old, has had a business selling sandwiches and hamburgers for 2 years. He has a very good customer base since he sells his food at a good price. He sells out of his cart, traveling to various markets. With the profits he earns he is able to cover some of his household expenses.

Nelson is requesting a loan that will allow him to buy everything necessary to make his sandwiches and hamburgers, such as bread, tomatoes, onions, mayonnaise, cold cuts and other ingredients, as well as repair his cart - which appears in the photograph. He will be able to have a better income and continue helping at home with expenses.

loans.use: to buy bread, tomatoes, onions, mayonnaise, cold cuts and other ingredients, and to repair his food cart.

loans.name: Jaime Joel

texts.es: Jaime de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, el se dedica a la venta de medicina popular desde hace 3 años, vende en los diferentes mercados y ya tiene muchos clientes por la calidad del producto y los buenos precios, Jaime está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas medicina popular por mayor ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Jaime is 38 years old, and he lives in his own home with his life partner. Jaime has been selling popular medicine for three years, and he does business in various markets. He has many clients because of the quality of the product and the good prices. Jaime is requesting a loan to purchase more popular medicine in bulk, as this is his only source of work, and so that he can have better earnings.

loans.use: purchase more popular medicine in bulk.

loans.name: Tấm

texts.en:
Mrs. Tấm works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle.

Tấm is 54 years old and she is married with no children. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with two dependents.

This is Tấm's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Tấm has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main harship that Tấm faces in her life is not having money to repair her latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to repair her latrine (toilet) and bathroom.

With her business profit, Tấm hopes for her business to do well, to buy land of her own, and to buy a motorbike.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to repair her latrine (toilet) and bathroom.

loans.name: Vital Yovany
